K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:1b-1: shr'i dzny'a na ti la ka yo gi n'i tantra r'a dza pa ra ma ma h'a aad bhu tam na ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:1b-3: dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba; dpal ye shes thig le la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2a-1: gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2a-4: thugs kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2a-5: dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas rnam par bskor nas rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2a-6: der dpal nam mkha' dri med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2a-7: shin tu stobs chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2b-1: thams cad kyi byed pa po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2b-3: zhi ba chen po'i bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2b-5: rmad du byung ba'i dpa' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2b-7: nag po chen po dregs 'joms dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2b-10: yang dpa' mo'i dbang mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams la 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2b-17: bag yod thor cog ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:2b-19: zhi ba 'chi ba'i pho nya ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3a-5: yang ma mo'i btsun mo rnams la 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3a-11: dus kyi bde byed ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3a-22: de lta bu'i rab zhal la sogs pa dpa' bo chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3a-23: dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-0: ma mo'i btsun mo bya ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyi 'khor gyi dbus su legs dgyes @3b chen po'i sbyor ba la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-1: kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-2: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-3: zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-4: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-5: de la rang gi ngo bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-7: tshad dag dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug 'khor thams cad dang lhan cig tu lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te sa la lta zhing cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-10: de'i tshe nam mkha' la me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-11: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-19: n'a ga ge sar la sogs pa dri zhim pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-20: rin po che'i char du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du babs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:3b-21: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-0: khyod ci zhig la ya mtshan @4a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-2: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-4: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-5: zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-6: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-7: de la rang gi ngo bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-9: rnam pa yod dam ci lags zhes bdag ya mtshan du gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-10: dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang phyug la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-11: ae ma ho de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-12: zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-13: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la de'i rang gi ngo bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-17: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo stong pa nyid 'di ga la shes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-18: mig yor tsam gyi rgyu'i rten ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-20: de ltar gla rtsi la brten nas dri 'byung ba gla rtsi'i dngos po med na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-22: de bzhin du rang gi ngo bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-24: rnam pa dag med par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-25: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-26: zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-27: phyag rgya chen po'i sku'i rnyed pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-29: khyab dang khyab byed bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-30: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-31: bde ba sku la brnyen pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-32: bde la brten na de nyid 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4a-33: bde sku rnam par shes yin na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-0: @4b thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-1: drug gi bde ba ye shes mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-2: bde dang sku ni gnyis las 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-3: 'khor lo drug gi dbus na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-4: de nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-5: zla ba la sogs 'bral bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-6: de nyid gsum bdag rgyu ru grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-7: lus rten srog gi dbyug pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-8: sbyor ba drug gi ye shes bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-9: 'khor lo drug gi lte ba'i dbus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-10: phra mo'i lus ldan rtsa ni drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-11: thig le dang bcas de rnams sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-12: srog gi dbyug pa'i nang du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-13: bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-14: zla mo tshe dang ldan pa ste; ;de ni srog dbyug rtsa ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-15: zur gsum gyi ni rnam pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-16: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lte ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-17: lce ma bde ba ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-18: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i ske //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-19: rigs kyi me tog dang 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-20: chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-21: nam mkha' ma ni ye shes ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-22: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i snying //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-23: ba yi mig gi rnam pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-24: lte ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i nang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-25: 'od ma dang ni dus ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-26: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i lte //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-27: padma rgyas pa'i rnam pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-28: me yi 'khor lo'i snying ga yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-30: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i 'doms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-31: rdo rje'i rnam pa bzhin du gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-32: rlung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:4b-33: stobs ni brtson 'grus ma dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-2: til gyi me tog rgyas pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-3: de ni sbyor drug gi rnam shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-4: rtsa dang thig le dang ldan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-5: rtog med mas ni 'khyud yin phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-6: de tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-7: de yi dus ni bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-8: shar dang nub pa rnam gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-9: gang gi tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa la mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-10: de la lte ba'i 'og tu 'pho ba bcu drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-12: byang chub kyi sems dang rlung gnyis phrad pa'i phyir 'pho ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-13: steng 'og gcig pu'i dngos po sbyor ba'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-14: byang chub kyi sems dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gdu bu'i rnam pa sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo gcig pu'i rtog med bde legs yid mas tshangs pa'i dbyug pa 'khyud nas bde ba chen po'i gtsug tor nas gsang ba bde ba chen po nor bu'i kha rlung gi 'khor lo yan chad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-15: ji ltar tsandan go sh'irsha'i shing la sbrul chen po yod pa lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5a-17: de la ji ltar rang gi ngo bo bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5b-0: tshangs pa'i rus pa'i dbyug pa'i snying po'i dang po zur gsum gyi rnam pa mdud pa lte ba'i srog gi rlung dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'od kyi thig le shes rab ma'i lte bas zla ba yar ngo'i tshes dang po'i chu tshod gcig gi bar du 'dod @5b pa'i dga' bshar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5b-1: padma'i 'bras bu'i 'dod pa las 'dar ba'i nye ba dang ldan pa tshes gnyis kyi bar du stobs nub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5b-2: drag po'i mig gi 'dus pa las 'gro ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa tshes gsum gyi chu tshod gsum gyi bar du sprin gyi thig le shar ba'i dus su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5b-3: rigs kyi bu me tog gi nu ma reg pa las dga' ba gyen du 'gro ba dang ldan pa'i tshes bzhi'i chu tshod bzhi'i bar du nub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5b-4: tshangs pa'i mig ma mchu'i bdud rtsi btung ba sbyin pa las rgyas pa thur du byung ba dang ldan pa tshes lnga'i chu tshod lnga'i bar dbugs shar ba'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5b-5: dung gi mig gis sen mo btab pa las drag po 'jigs pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'i tshes drug gi chu tshod drug gi bar du autpa la'i nub pa'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5b-6: rna ba'i mig gi sbyor ba las byung ba'i khyab byed dang ldan pa'i tshes bdun gyi chu tshod bdun gyi bar du mgo ka la shar ba'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5b-7: ba'i mig gis 'bras bu'i bskyod pa las mchog gi dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa tshes brgyad kyi chu tshod brgyad kyi bar du yid nub pa'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:5b-8: dung gi lte ba'i nu ma dam por 'khyud pa las 'bar ba lhod pa dang ldan pa'i tshes dgu'i chu tshod dgu'i bar du snying po shar ba'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-0: glang po che'i lte ba'i ske'i [?] sgra las thig le mtha' dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu'i chu tshod bcu'i bar du zla ba nub @6a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-2: autpa la'i lte ba'i mig gi 'o las myos pa khrung khrung dang ldan ba'i tshes bcu gcig gi chu tshod bcu gcig bar du nyi ma shar ba'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-3: padma'i lte ba'i sbrug cing bsigs pa las dga' bral gyi dga' ba kro dha dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi bar du drag po nub pa'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-4: bud ba'i kha'i grong khyer las aud mi rem pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gsum gyi chu tshod bcu gsum gyi bar du mchog gi shar ba'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-5: rma bya'i kha'i bskum pa las tshul 'byed pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du sgra nub pa'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-6: rdo rje'i kha ru mnyam par sbyor ba las gnyid 'on pa dang ldan pa'i nya'i chu tshod bco lnga'i bar du ro'i shar ba'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-7: rnam par rgyas pa'i til gyi me tog ha brjod pa las tshes bcu drug gi chu tshod bcu drug gi bar du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gsal ba dang ldan pa'i thog gi nub pa'i dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-8: thog ni sngags 'jigs byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-9: de la nub pa bcu drug yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-10: shar dang nub pa gang la lar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-11: lhan cig skyes la de yod min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-12: yon po'i gdu bu'i rnam par 'byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-13: rtsa yi lte dbus thig le dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-14: dga' ba la sogs shar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6a-15: de ni nub pa'i dus su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-0: de ltar bde chen @6b rnam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-1: 'pho ba ru ni bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-2: dngos dang rten dang rnam par 'byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-3: ye shes dga' bral lhan rtag bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-4: dngos po ro mnyam lta ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-5: 'dod pa chags pa'i rnam dag byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-6: 'dus pa reg bya byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-7: dngos ni srid pa med par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-9: dngos ni dngos por rab gcod byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-11: zur gsum la sogs brten pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-12: rten ni bsam du med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-13: chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-14: steng dang 'og ni mnyam pa'i rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-15: mya ngan 'das pa rtog med byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-16: bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-17: rigs lnga yi ni mchog gi gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-18: ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-19: 'dar ba dga' ba mchog gi dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-20: ye shes shes pa lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-21: gzhi med pa yi lhan cig skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-22: gzhi dang bcas pa dga' bral dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-23: ye shes nga rgyal med par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-24: chos kun rnam par shes pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-25: ye shes shes bya don grub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-27: tshul dang sprin dang stobs bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-28: rnam par 'byed pa dngos kun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-29: rnam pa'i gzhi dang bcas pa thim; ;skye dang gnas pa sgyu 'phrul gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-30: rnam par 'byed pa gti mug gsod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:6b-31: 'khor lo sngags dang bya ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-2: bcom pa'i phyir ni rnam par 'byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-3: ye shes kyi ni snying po'i mtha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-4: rnam par 'byed pa gsol ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-5: ye shes shin tu bde byed phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-6: rnam par 'byed par de phyir brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-7: gnyis su med pa mchog zhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-8: chags pa dang ni chags bral min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-9: dri ma med pa bcos med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-10: rgyud dang sngags dang rim pa bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-11: rang rigs pa dang brjod du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-12: thams cad khyab cing dpe byad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-13: de lta bu ni don dam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-14: lha yi dbang phyug rnam par 'byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-15: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-16: thugs kar rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-17: rnam par 'byed la sgom pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-18: phung po khams la sogs dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-19: sgra la sogs pa'i chos kyis stong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-20: stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-21: tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-22: dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-23: de rnams kun gyi yab yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-25: de nyid ye shes thig le 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-26: mchog rnams grub pa'i mnga' bdag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-27: 'byung ba kun gyi nang yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-28: sku lnga'i bdag yid rab mchog yin; ;mkha' 'gro dbang phyug lnga bdag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-29: nam mkha' bdag nyid skye med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-30: nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7a-31: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-0: de lta'i @7b gsang chen ye shes ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-1: ye shes dbang po rnyed dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-2: ji ltar nor ni rkun mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-3: ma rnyed byed ltar 'bad pas sba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-4: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-5: 'pho ba'i dus shar ba dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-6: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-8: de nyid gsum bdag nga ro ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-9: de bzhin zla ba'i bde ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-10: phyag rgya chen po'i rnam pa ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-11: de yi mtha' ni ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-13: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs; ;rdo rje gsung ni ye shes mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-14: zla ba'i bde ba mchog ces pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-15: de yi phung po dbang po khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-16: phyag rgya chen po rdor snying po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-17: de yi mtha' ni bha gar dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-18: mtha' dang snang ba rnam par shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-19: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-20: chos kun rang bzhin dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-21: snang ba las ni thams cad 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-22: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-24: de'i phyi rol chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-25: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:7b-26: de la dang po rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bskyed pa sgom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-1: dbang bskur gyi rim pa de dag bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-2: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-3: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-4: zla ba mchog gi bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-5: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la sogs pa'i phyogs tsam bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-6: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa; tshangs pa'i rus pa srog gi dbyug pa'i steng dang 'og gi 'pho ba cha gnyis su rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin las le'u dang por gang gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-7: de rnams kyi nang nas gcig tu rtog med bde legs yid ma gcig pu nges par bstan par mdzad kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-9: rtsa gzhan rnams ci'i don phyir 'dir ma gsungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-11: gcig pu rtog med bde legs yid ma de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-12: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi phra mo'i dra ba rnams rol mo'i don du byas nas sna tshogs kyi bdud rtsi bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-13: chos kyi 'byung gnas chen po'i sa steng du 'byung zhing skye'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-14: char 'bab pa'i don du bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-15: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8a-16: de ltar lags mod kyang rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig po rnams kyi mtshan dang grangs 'dir mchog gi dbang phyug la bka' drin zhu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-0: bcom ldan @8b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-2: sum cu rtsa gcig gi ming rnams nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-35: rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-36: steng dang 'og tu 'pho ba gnyis kyi zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su tshigs rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-37: de nas dbang gi rim pa bshad ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-38: ji ltar yi ni go rim du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-39: dbang bskur mchog ni rnyed pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-40: thams cad du ni nus par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-41: yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-42: bla mas dang por dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-43: khrus byas mig dag ras kyis dgab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-44: snyim pa me tog gis bkang ldan; ;yon phul nas ni dga' dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-45: lha yi dbang phyug dbang bskur byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-46: dbang bskur nas ni sangs rgyas sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:8b-47: the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-2: dpal ldan dbang rgyal blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-3: dbang bskur bzhi ru phye ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-4: slob dpon la sogs dbye ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-5: dang por slob dpon gyi ni dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-6: gnyis pa de ni gsang ba'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-7: gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-8: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-9: bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-10: slob dpon dbang la sogs par bskur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-11: rdo rje slob dpon dbang gsum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-12: nam mkha' mnyam du bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-13: de gnyis la ni bcu gcig phye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-14: rdo rje slob dpon dbang rgyal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-15: dbang bskur de ni rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-16: khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-18: 'di ru rim pas bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-19: chu dang dbu rgyan rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-20: dril bu ming dang brtul zhugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-21: lung bstan pa dang skyabs sbyin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-22: phyag rgya sngags dang ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-23: rnal 'byor rgyud la mos pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-24: dbang brgyad phye la sbyin par bya; ;rnal 'byor bla ma la mos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-25: bcu gcig bdag nyid sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-26: rnal 'byor ma la mos pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-27: gsang ba'i dbang ni sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-28: gsang ba gnyis su dbye bar gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-29: de ni phyi dang nang gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-31: dbang bskur shes pas sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9a-32: nang gi rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-0: gsang ba'i @9b dbang ni rab tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-1: de ni gsang ba gsum du dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-2: skye dang mdud dang de bzhin sad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-3: shes rab rnams pa gnyis su dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-4: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-5: shes rab brgyad gnyis lo dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-6: spyan ring cha la mkhas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-7: yan lag tsandan gsar pa'i dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-8: shin tu 'jam pa'i khu bas tshim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-9: gzugs bzang sngo la skal ldan ma; ;'o 'dzin mkhrang zhing 'jam la mtho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-10: bsam gtan sngags la dad cing zhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-11: dbang bskur dang ldan thugs rje grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-12: de lta'i rab grags 'bad de btsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-13: dbang gi don du bla mar zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-14: de kun mtshan nyid dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-15: chung ma yang na sring mo 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-16: bu mo yang na mna' ma 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-17: mkhas pas 'bad de blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-18: rang gi rigs ni ji bzhin rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-19: khu ba dang bcas gzhon nu ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-20: sna tshogs rgyan gyis legs par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-21: mkhas pas bla ma la ni dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-22: dbang gi man ngag gsum du bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-23: nang gi yi ni brda byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-24: bzhi pa 'bras bu'i ngo bor grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-25: gsum dang bral ba'i gsum bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-26: dga' ba la sogs bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-27: rdo rje gzhon nu mas gsal dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-28: dbang bskur gyis ni 'khor los bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-29: the tshom med par yin par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-30: dbang gis dri ma med par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:9b-31: chu la sogs pas ras bkrus bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-2: yan lag de nyid dang ni bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-3: gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-4: bla ma rab kyi zhal nas blang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-5: g /zhan du rtog ga'i tshogs la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-6: sgra yi bstan bcos rtag mos la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-7: dbang gi mchog ni rnam pa gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-8: blang bar mi bya sbyin mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-9: yang dag 'bras bu 'dod pa ni; ;de ni ring du blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-10: de ltar yang bye ma du ma bsdus pa'i phung po la 'bad de rnam par btsir bas mar khu'i thigs pa phyed kyang mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-11: de bzhin du rtog ge mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-12: ngag gi dra ba dang ldan pa bstan pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-13: nyan pa las ni de la nyon mongs pa 'ba' zhig las gzhan 'bras bu ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-15: de bas na gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyud de rnyed pa'i dbang shes pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-16: rdo rje slob dpon bla ma chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-17: mi gsal mchog gi bkra shis can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-18: sangs rgyas 'bras bu sbyin pa'i sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-19: bla ma'i gzugs so gzhan ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-20: bsod nams thams cad kyi ni gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-21: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-22: tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-23: de kun gyis ni bdag mchod 'os //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-24: ma grags kyang ni grags gzugs yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10a-25: de ltar shes nas sgrub pa pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-0: 'bad pa yis ni mchod @10b par bya; ;bla ma'i zhal snga mchod byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-2: rgyud kyi don nam dbang gi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-3: shes nas bla ma mi mchod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-4: sa steng nyi zla yod bar du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-5: de ni mnar med pa ru 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-6: de bas kun tu 'bad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-7: gus pas bla ma mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-8: rin chen sna tshogs bzor byas legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-9: gser gyi padma dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-10: mu tig do shal rin thang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-11: sna tshogs du ma yi ni gos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-12: gces pa'i btsun mo bu dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-13: glang po rta dang bran la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-14: dpal ldan bla ma'i spyan snga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-15: dad gus brtan pas dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-16: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-17: yon dbul ba dang bcas pa'i dbang gi rim pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-18: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-19: gnas kyi rnyed pa ji bzhin don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-20: ka ba gcig dang sgo dgur ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-21: rdo rje rtsig pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-22: rdo rje'i thig dang bla re ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-23: kun tu yongs su bskor ba yin; ;rlung la sogs pa'i rig pas dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-24: 'byung ba bzhi dang ldan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-25: ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha' kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-26: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-27: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-29: rtsibs bcu pa la gser gyi mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-30: khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:10b-31: khro bo thams cad zhal gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-4: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-7: dbu skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-8: aag tshom dang smin ma che zhing ring ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-9: shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-11: phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang rtse gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-12: phyag g-yon gnyis na thod pa dang dbyug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-13: lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po g-yas kyi zhal dmar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-15: phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang ral gri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-16: phyag g-yon pa gnyis na mtshon rtse gcig dang mgo bo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-17: nub tu padma mthar byed dmar po zhal g-yas dkar zhing g-yon sngon po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-18: g-yas dang g-yon gyi bzhin ral gri dang 'khor lo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-19: zla ba phyed pa dang ri rab zur brgyad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-20: byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gnyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-22: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag bzhin rdo rje rgya gram dang ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11a-24: me'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs can g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gnyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-1: g-yas phyag gnyis na ral gri dang rin po che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-2: phyag g-yon na sta re dang mdung thung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-3: srin po'i mtshams su dbyug pa sngon po chu srin 'dzin ser po'i gzugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-4: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ljang ba dang dmar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-5: phyag g-yas gnyis na rgya gram rtse gsum dang ral gri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-6: phyag g-yon gnyis na s'a la'i shing chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-8: rlung mtshams su stobs po che du ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-9: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-11: phyag bzhi la ral gri dang dung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-12: dgra sta dang rnga ma'o; ;dbang ldan gyi mtshams su mi g-yo mgon dkar nag zhal g-yon dmar po dang g-yas sngon po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-13: g-yas g-yon gyi phyag bzhin ral gri dang lcags kyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-14: pi wang dang rde'u chung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-15: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba sku mdog ser po g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-17: phyag bzhin 'khor lo dang ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-18: ka p'a la dang kha tv'am ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-19: 'og tu sum bha'i rgyal po sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-20: g-yas kyi zhal mthon mthing chen po'i 'od can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-23: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na ral gri dang lcags kyu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:11b-24: g-yon gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-0: thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang @12a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-2: rang gi 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-3: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-4: 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyi steng du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-5: gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang sum bha'i rgyal po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-6: zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-7: 'di 'khor lo'i lte ba gru gsum gyi gzugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-8: ri bong can dkar po'i 'od chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-9: de'i dbus su sngar bstan pa'i 'byung ba bzhi ji lta bu'i rim pas rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa las dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang yangs pa chen po'i 'phar ma gnyis nyi ma'i gdan du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi lte bar 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi bde byed ma'i steng du tshul dang thigs pa'i rang gi ngo bo a'a li dang k'a li gnyis las byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-10: mam h'um las dpal ye shes thig le phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhal brgyad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12a-18: autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'o; ;rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-0: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba tshes pas ral pa'i dbu rgyan @12b dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-1: dpral bar thod pa'i steng du mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-2: phyag rgya drug gis sku bcings pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-3: rgyu mas brgyus pa'i mgo bo chen po'i do shal gyis sku brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-4: tshangs pa'i pags pa'i rked pa'i sham thabs can gyi skur bzhengs shing he ha'i gad rgyangs dang phem ka ra'i tshol ba'i sgra chen po'i nga ro bsgrags shing brjod pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i g-yul sa bye ba'i grangs kyi thod pa'i lto ba brlag par mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-7: lce spyang gi tshogs 'jigs su rung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-8: sha za'i tshogs ha har dgod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-9: nag po'i me can gyi dur khrod chen po brgyad na 'jigs byed kyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'i gar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-10: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-12: da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-14: sa yi cha ni mnyam pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-15: sbrang rtsi ga pur gyis ni byug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-16: dri zhim pa yi me tog bkram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-17: me tog gis ni chal par dgram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-18: chu ngogs yang na thang stong du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-19: rdo rje skud pa yis ni bskor; ;mig mdzes rdo rje gzhon nu ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-20: zla ba nyi mas padma khengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-21: lang tsho gsar la reg bya 'jam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:12b-22: dang po mkhas pas 'jug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-0: sngags kyi gnas kyi lugs ji @13a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-1: bzhin; ;legs dgyes shin tu sbyor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-2: de yi sbyor ba gang zhig 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-3: kha dang sa sogs mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-5: rdo rje yi ni phur bu bcu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-6: mkhas pas khro ba'i sngags kyis gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-7: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-8: 'dab ma kun la rim pas dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-9: a'a li ye shes 'dab ma gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-10: k'a li 'dab ma bdun du dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-11: 'dab ma re re yi ge lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-12: lnga pa lnga ni lnga la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-13: 'dab ma gnyis su bzhi gnyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-14: ksha yi yig 'bru lte nang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-15: dbyangs yig gsal yig bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-16: a'a li k'a li 'du shes yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-17: gnyis kyi yi ge 'dab ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-18: sngags kyi rgyal po de nyid dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-19: dang po'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-20: de nas 'dab gnyis kyi dbang por //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-21: bzhi pa'i dbyangs yig dang bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-22: 'og tu re pha yis ni brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-23: de nas nyi shu rtsa lnga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-25: dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-26: khro bo ngan 'gro dag byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-27: 'dab gnyis dang po bzhi ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-28: de nas gsal byed pa yis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-29: 'dab gnyis dang po gnyis pa yin; ;ldan pa thams cad rims 'phrog byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-30: gsal byed pa la gsum pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-31: bcu pas yang dag ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13a-32: dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-0: lha yi dbang phyug @13b brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-1: bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-2: de nas de yi dang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-3: bcu drug pa la gsum pas ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-4: thams cad sngags kyi tshig gi gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-5: de nas sa ni dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-6: de bzhin gsal byed dang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-7: yan lag gsal byed sum cu gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-8: dbyangs yig drug pa yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-9: thams cad kyi ni 'byung ba'i gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-10: zla tshes thig les rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-11: de ni de dang nye bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-12: sems kyi dbang phyug yi ge mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-13: gang zhig lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-14: gsum pa'i dang po dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-15: mthar ni sv'ah'a ldan pa ste; ;snying po'i sngags ni rmad byung mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-16: dang po ru ni gzugs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-18: 'og tu re pha yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-19: dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas sbyar; ;rig pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-20: thig le yis ni mgo bo mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-21: de ring du ni nye bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-22: thams cad zhi ba zhi ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-23: thigs pas mnan pas sum cu gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-24: bcu drug pa ni gnyis par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-25: yang ni de nyid yi ge mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-26: khams gsum mun pa sel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-27: h'um phat de ni gnyis ka sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-28: tha mar sv'ah'a yis ni ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-29: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-30: bcom ldan ye shes thig les so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-31: dang por rnam par snang mdzad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-32: nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:13b-33: gsal byed pa ni gzhi gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-2: nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa yi gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-3: dbyangs kyi yi ge bdun pas ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-4: bzhi pa las ni gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-5: de dang nye bar rlung yin no; ;dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-6: 'bras bu thams cad don sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-7: lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-8: lha yi yig 'bru de yang nye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-9: lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-10: nyi shu rtsa brgyad de nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-11: lnga pa yi ni dang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-12: nyi shu rtsa bdun de nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-13: dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pas ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-14: khams gsum dgug par nus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-15: gsal byed kyi ni dang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-16: nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ni ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-17: nyi shu rtsa lnga pa dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-18: dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-19: nyi shu rtsa drug yi ge mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-20: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-21: sv'ah'a mtha' ru ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-22: h'um h'um phat gyis spel bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-23: de ni phyag rgya che snying po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-24: yid bzhin rin chen mnyam pa'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-25: dang po yi ni pra na pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-26: de nas 'dab gnyis pa yi gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-27: ya yi sde tshan gnyis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-28: nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-29: dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-30: snying la khong du chud par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-31: drug cu rtsa bzhi phyed dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-32: ra yi yig 'bru de dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-33: mtha mar sv'ah'a dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-34: h'um h'um phat ni spel ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-35: nye ba'i snying po sngags cen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-36: thams cad sngags kyi bdag nyid mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14a-37: aom shr'i ma h'a k'a ru na kru ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-1: spha ra na ma h'a ka wa na t'a ghe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-2: sa ma pra bha dza ya bi dza ya aatt'atta h'a sa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-3: ma h'a gho ra gho re shva ra ma h'a b'i ra b'i re shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-4: ma h'a ru dhi r'am tra m'a la dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-5: soo ma s'urya aagni lo tsa na; a'a k'a sho da ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-6: ma h'a s'a ga ra ko ga ge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-13: a'a karsha ya a'a karsha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-14: bhanydza ya bhanydza ya; ts'urna ya ts'urna ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-21: aom ma h'a kro dhe shva r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-22: aom ma h'a bee be de spha ra na ra ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-23: aom ma h'a kalp'anta aaghe sa ma pra bh'a ya h'um phat sv'h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-24: aom dza ya bi dza y'att'atta h'a s'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-25: aom ma h'a gho ra gho re shva r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-26: aom ma h'a b'i ra b'i re shva r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-27: aom ma h'a ru dhi r'anta m'a l'a dha r'a ya h'um phat sv'h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-28: aom soo ma s'u rya aagni lo tsa t'a y'a h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-29: aom a'a ka sho da r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-30: aom ma h'a s'a ga ra ko ke ni h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-31: aom ha na ha na h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-32: aom da ha da ha h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-33: aom pa tsa pa tsa h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-34: aom ma da ma da h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-35: aom bi dham sa ya bi dhvam [?] sa ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-36: aom a'a karsha ya a'a karsha ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-37: aom bhanydza ya bhanydza ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-38: aom ts'urna ya ts'urna ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-39: aom ha ha ha ha h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:14b-40: aom hi hi hi hi h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-0: aom ma h'a ru dhi ra p'a ni @15a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-2: aom h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-3: aom phat phat phat phat h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-4: phreng ba'i sngags ni mchog gi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-5: las thams cad ni rab grub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-6: aom ma h'a k'a ma r'u pe ni yi sa ra sa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-7: bi sa ra bi sa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-9: sarb'artha s'a dha ya s'a dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-12: ma h'a b'i ra b'i re shva ra sapta p'a t'a la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-15: shu sha ne ru sha ne mu ha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-18: tree lokya bha yam ka re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-19: ham ham him him h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-25: sa ma pra bh'a ya h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-26: phreng ba'i sngags ni mchog gi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-27: bcom ldan mo yi bdag gis bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-44: 'khor lo'i sngags ni sngags chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-45: dpa' bo rnams kyi snying po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-46: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee aa aoo aam aa:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-47: dpa' bo'i yan lag ma snying sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-48: lha yi dbang phyug bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-49: dang po ra aom dang mthar h'um phat//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-50: bar du ming ni spel ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-51: gsang ba'i sngags kyi dgod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-52: mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-53: aom n'a da ni rma l'a ya h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15a-54: aom bindur tha ga me h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-0: aom @15b [?] svah'a k'a l'a gr'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-1: aom n'a da ma tra sva r'u p'a ya h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-2: aom pa ra shu ra p'a ya h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-3: aom aa pa ra ma na bu g'a ya h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-4: ye shes drug gi mchog sngags dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-5: 'khor lo drug pa'i nang na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-6: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-7: 'di yi sngags kyis mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-8: aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha sgra ni grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-9: sde tshan brgyad kyi gtso bo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-10: rtsa ba'i sde tshan gtor ma gtang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-11: brtag pa gnyis kyi ji bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-12: rdo rje'i phyag rgya'am snying po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-13: mig mi 'dzum pa'i lta bas sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-14: srung 'khor yod pa'i khro bo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-15: de yi sngags ni bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-17: ghu ghu ro ghu ghu ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-19: bi dha ra bi dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-20: ta ghe ta ta ghe ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-21: spho li gi spho li gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-22: aa ta aa ta ha sa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-25: bi kra ma bi kra ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-26: h'um phat kyis ni mtha' ma ra ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-27: bar du ming ni spel ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-28: rdo rje gsum pa ye shes rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-29: aom a'a: h'um ni sngags kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-30: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-31: sngags btu ba zhes pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-32: de nas mchod sbyin rab bdag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-33: gnas la sogs pa'i rim pas sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-34: bskyed pa'i bye brag thigs pa gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-35: rdzogs pa'i rim gsum de ltar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-36: rnam shes la sogs bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:15b-37: mchod sbyin tshangs pa'i g-yul sa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-2: snang dang nam mkha' ye shes bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-3: sku brgyad kyi ni bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-4: dngos po rten dang rnam par 'byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-5: ji bzhin 'dod ba sdud pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-7: aoodyan la sogs gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-8: legs dgyes ma sogs lha mo kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-9: k'a li ye shes yig mchog sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-10: phyi dang nang du bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-11: mchod sbyin byas na sbyin pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-12: 'bras bu bkra shis ldan pa skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-13: sems can rnams kyi bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-14: sna tshogs thabs ni rab tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-15: kha cig la ni 'dul ba'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-16: kha cig rnams la mdo sde'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-17: la la pha rol phyin pa'i lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-18: kha cig la ni sngags kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-19: rab 'bring tha ma'i bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-20: thar par 'gro ba'i thabs yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-21: blo gros che yang theg gzhan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-22: grangs med gsum gyis sangs rgyas yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-23: sngags kyi theg pa la mos na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-24: tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas so; ;yang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-25: rnal 'byor ma khyod smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-26: yang na lus ni spangs ma thag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-27: bla na med pa'i ye shes dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-28: brtson par mi ldan pas kyang rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-29: brtson 'grus ldan pas smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-30: brtan pa'i brtson pas don thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16a-32: don kun grub pa'i bsod nams can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-0: rtog med nyon @16b mongs med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-1: gang zhig las ni ci byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-2: de ni bsod nams 'phel ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-3: 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang gang spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-4: de kun mchod pa la sogs yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-5: de ni mchod sbyin 'phel ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-6: mchod las ye shes 'bras bu rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-7: de ni mchod sbyin yang dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-8: rgyud kun tu ni rnyed dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-9: 'bras bu chen po thams cad sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-10: rnal 'byor ma yis gzhi yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-11: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-12: mchod sbyin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-13: de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-14: sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-15: yid 'phrog lha yi me tog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-16: zla ba nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-17: me dang sgron ma rmad du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-18: mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la mchod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-19: dbang ni mar ngo'i dang po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-20: bcu drug pa yi dang po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-21: gnyis pa yi ni rab thim gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-22: bcu drug dang po'i 'og ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-23: gsum pa yi ni longs spyod yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-24: bcu drug pa yi gsum pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-25: bzhi pa yi ni thim pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-26: gsum pa yi ni 'og mas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-27: lnga pa yi ni longs spyod yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-28: bcu drug pa yi lnga pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-29: drug pa yi ni thim pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-30: bcu drug pa yi drug pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-31: bdun pa yi ni rab mchod dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-32: mar ngo yi ni brgyad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-33: dbyangs yig brgyad pos mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:16b-34: dgu pa yi ni longs spyod 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-1: drug pa yi dgu pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-2: bcu pa yi ni thim pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-3: dbyangs yig gi ni bcu pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-4: bcu gcig pa yi dbang yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-5: bcu gcig pa yis mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-6: bcu gnyis kyi ni thim pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-7: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis po yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-8: bcu gsum pa yi longs spyod ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-9: de gnyis kyis ni mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-10: bcu bzhi yis ni thim par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-11: dbyangs yig bdun pa gnyis kyis mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-12: nya gang ba la dbang yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-13: dbyangs yig bco lnga pa yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-14: byang chub sems 'byung mchod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-15: yar ngo mar ngo bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-16: shes rab thabs ni rab tu sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-17: sku gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-18: tshes dang yi ge sngags kyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-20: thig le nam mkha' 'gog pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-22: thig le'i rang bzhin ye shes ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-23: sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang rnyed dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-24: bdag gi bka' drin rang bzhin myur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-25: the tshom med par rnyed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-26: blun po gang gis bdag mi shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-27: bsam gtan rags la rtag mos pa; ;de rnams kun ni grub pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-28: lha yi dbang phyug bden pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-29: sa kun dbang phyug gi bdag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-30: sa kun dbang phyug mnga' bdag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17a-31: sa kun dbang phyug gi rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-0: @17b thams cad bdag nyid kun nang bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-1: thams cad khyab pa rtag tu stong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-3: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-5: mchog gi nam mkha' mtha' med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-6: mtshan nyid dang bral gzhi dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-7: lha yi dbang rnams thub dbang rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-8: rdo rje can yang rnyed dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-9: chos dang longs spyod bdag gis mtha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-10: ye shes rnam shes ngo bo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-11: rdo rje can dang sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-12: lha yi dbang phyug rnyed par sla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-13: rnam pa mchog gi ye shes sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-14: sus kyang sla ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-15: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-16: mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-17: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-18: sbyin sreg sdig pa 'jig byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-19: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-20: de bzhin dbang dang drag po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-21: zhi ba'i ho ma khung zlum po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-22: rgyas pa yi ni gru bzhi'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-23: dbang ni gzhu yi rnam pa bzhin; ;drag po yi ni gru gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-24: dkar po ser dang de bzhin dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-25: nag po 'di ni rim pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-26: rgya mtsho me dang mig zla ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-27: lha yi dbang phyug tshad yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-28: gzhan kun gyi ni rim pas gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-29: sngar grub kyis ni gzhan mi 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-30: hom khung re rer snying gar pad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-31: rigs kyi las kyi go rim mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:17b-32: de steng sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-2: lte ba'i nang du me lha ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-3: zhal gsum pa dang phyag bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-4: sku mdog ser po spyan zlum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-5: ral pa'i cod pan gyis ni brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-7: rdo rje skyil krung du ni bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-8: ba dan gsum dang bgrang phreng g-yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-9: g-yon na dbyig gu spyi blugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-10: snying ga ru ni me yi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-12: cod pan rin chen 'byung ldan mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-13: thig les dbus su me yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-14: tshur gshegs 'od zer cher ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-15: 'dod pa'i don kun grub dbang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-17: rang byung chen po bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-19: me lha las kun sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-20: 'dir ni bdag la nye bar bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-21: me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-31: de nas gdan dbul ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-32: mdzub mo lu gu rgyud byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-33: bar ma sbyar byad kyi ni gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-34: srin lag mig gi bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-35: mthe chung mthe bong zlum po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-36: gdan dbul ba yi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-37: mkhas pa yis ni yo byad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18a-38: dang po nye ba nyid du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-0: dka' ba med par ji ltar @18b rnyed; ;de ni de nyid rab grub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-1: sgrub pa'i dbang po yon tan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-2: sngags dang rgyud kyi thos pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-3: sngags kyi bzlas la gcig tu mos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-5: thig le tshul ni ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-6: bye brag shes pa rin chen rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-7: rigs lnga'i gzhon nu ma yi lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-8: yid dga'i khu ba yis ni tshim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-9: spyan ring ma dang dag pa ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-11: sbyin sreg gnas su gar dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-12: gcer bu dang ni skra grol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-13: sbyin sreg las su don bsgrub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-14: rigs lnga'i bu mo gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-15: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-16: bla ma nyid kyis dang por mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-17: brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-19: rtog pa'i 'byung pos zin pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-20: sna tshogs thabs ni bdag gis bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-21: don dam du ni phyi don med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-22: nang gi ma yin bar ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-23: rdul med rnam par rdul med dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-24: stong pa dang ni stong min bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-25: rang rig ngo bo rang rig bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-26: ngag gi lam gyis mi rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-27: phung po khams ni rnam par rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-28: lha yi dbang phyug gang zhig sreg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-29: de ni me yi don dam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-30: lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-31: thams cad rnam pa mchog gis rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-32: chos kun gyi ni nang na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-33: kun rdzob rnam pas gzugs su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:18b-34: lha yi dbang phyug kun brtags yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-1: brtags ye shes sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-2: rim pas gnas ni rnyed bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-3: de bas kun nas 'bad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-4: rnam pa thams cad mchog gi rgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-5: rang dang gzhan gyi grub don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-6: mchod sbyin sbyin sreg gtor ma bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-7: bsod nams tshogs ni 'phel phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-8: sems can phan don de dag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-33: yan lag bcu pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-40: dar la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-41: me thab kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams kyi bye brag tu bum pa kun la sman sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-42: kha rgyan gyis brgyan cing dri zhim pa'i chus lto ba bkang la dar sna tshogs kyis mgrin pa brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-43: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-44: rgyas pa la ni gser gyi 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19a-45: thams cad kun gyis rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-0: dbang @19b la thams cad 'od dmar po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-1: zho dang 'o ma gnyis spangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-2: yungs nag dang ni sbrul nag po'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-3: bags ba bya rog gi ni mchu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-4: bya rog nag po mi nam [?] snying //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-5: klad pa rgyu ma rkang mar mgo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-6: thams cad nag po yi ni mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-7: khyi dag gi ni mjug ma 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-8: yungs nag mar khu mar khu che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-9: yi dvags gzhi dang mar khu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-10: phyed tshig yi dvags gyi ni ras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-11: rus tshig bud shing tshig pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-12: tsher ma rno la bzang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-13: tsher ma'i me tog ba ru ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-14: thug pa nag po ma bsres pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-15: drag po la ni rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-16: gzhan min dpa' bo'i dbang phyug bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-17: drag po la sogs su ni bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-18: rang gi de nyid zhi la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-19: phyag rgya la sogs rgyan dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-20: mar gsar dri ma med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-21: skyon dang bral ba'i me tog shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-22: gsar pa skam zhing dri zhim pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-23: du ba med cing skyon dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-24: thams cad la ni khru re'i tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-25: las la mkhas pas de ltar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-26: yang ni yam shing rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-27: ji ltar rnyed pa 'bad pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-30: sha ma ba sha ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-39: aa sho ka de rnams sor brgyad pa'i tshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-40: dgang gzar blugs gzar mar gyi snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-41: rin po che ru ji ltar bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:19b-42: lag pa yi ni dbyug pa tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-0: @20a *// 'bad pa yis ni dgang gzar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-1: dgang gzar ji bzhin blugs gzar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-2: mar khu'i snod ni de dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-3: gru gsum zlum po'i rnam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-4: rdo rje yis ni rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-5: dgang gzar gyi ni kha zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-6: sor drug pa yi tshad du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-7: mgo bo yang ni de bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-8: thams cad kun tu gru bzhi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-9: sna tshogs rdo rje snying ga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-10: lte ba padma yis ni brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-11: chu srin kha nas byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-12: rtse dgu pa yi rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-13: dgang gzar gyi ni mtha' ru ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-14: blugs gzar pa yi mig dang 'dra; ;yang na de ni padmas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-15: nang gi gting ring gsal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-16: ha cang ring dang thung ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-17: rdo rje phra mos nang du brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-18: mar zhu'i snod ni zlum por grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-19: lte ba ring zhing dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-20: rdo rje la sogs rgyan dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-21: lci ba dang ni yang pa spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-22: zhi ba la sogs bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-23: bzhi ru dbye ba bdag gis bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-24: drag po de ni dur khrod du; ;dbang ni chu yi ngogs su bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-25: rgyas pa zhing gi dbus su ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-26: yang na dgon pa chen po ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-27: zhi ba de ni grong khyer du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-28: yang na rgyal po yi ni khab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-29: rta dang glang po chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-30: gzhon nu ma dang ba la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-31: sbyin sreg dus su 'bad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-32: sngags pas slob dpon la dbul bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20a-33: zha bo 'on pa dman pa la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-0: ci nus kyis ni @20b sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-1: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-2: sbyin sreg gi chog zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-3: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-4: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtor ma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-5: khyim ni sum thog gi ni gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-6: chom rkun kun dang bral ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-7: phyi rol yul min nang gi min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-8: slob dpon 'dus las brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-9: rdo rje mda' ni rnam par gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-10: rdo rje skud la sogs pas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-11: de lta bu yi khang mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-12: sna tshogs me tog la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-13: dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-14: si hla ga bur gyis ni mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-15: de ru mchod sbyin don du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-16: byol song gzugs ni rab tu blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-17: skye ba gcig gam gnyis pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-18: yang na gsum pa lang tsho gsar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-19: nang kun med pa bde grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-20: dri zhim rdul ni 'byung ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-21: gang zhig mig ni yun ring 'dzum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-22: mkhas pas 'bad de blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-23: sna tshogs pa yi mchod sbyin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-24: gri gug rung pas brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-25: yan lag rab kyis padma'i snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-26: btung ba'i don du bla ma'i mdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-27: phyed ni 'khor lo la brim ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-28: phyed ni gtong mar gtang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-29: khrag chen dang ni sha chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-30: ci rnyed pa ni brtag pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-31: gzhan ni sna tshogs mchog bye brag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-32: nya dang sha la sogs par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:20b-33: mi 'tshe pa dang skyon kun bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-0: sdig pa med dang ma bslangs @21a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-1: pa'o; ;chang ni chen po dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-2: glu dang rol mos rab tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-3: sgron ma lnga dang bsres pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-5: sna tshogs dbus su yan lag mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-6: gang bas dkyil 'khor mdun du gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-7: ji ltar bla ma mchod dus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-8: ji bzhin pa yi phyag rgya bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-9: de bzhin du ni tshogs kyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-10: rtse gcig gis ni bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-12: tshogs kyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-13: shin tu dbyangs ni snyan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-14: yid 'phrog pa yi glu blang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-15: the tshom dang ni tshogs bcad min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-16: ma gnang rdo rje gar mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-17: rkang pa rkyong dang gnyid log pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-19: dpal ldan rdo rje sems ji bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-20: dpal ldan las kyi rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-21: ci mdzad pa dang ci gsung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-22: de ni mkhas pas 'bad de sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-23: de ltar min na chad pa 'bab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-24: ji tsam nus pa yod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-25: de ru dam tshig dag pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-26: rtag tu bdag nyid bzhin bsrung bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-27: dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-28: lha yi dbang phyug rnyed pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-29: dam tshig mchog gi ye shes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-30: dad pa yis ni rtag tu bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-31: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-32: 'khor lo dang bcas rigs rab tshim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21a-33: rab tshim byas nas gtor ma 'bul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-0: nam phyed lam gyi bzhi @21b mdor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-1: yang na sum mdo gyes pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-2: dur khrod dam ni chu ngogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-3: lhag ma 'am ni yang na phud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-4: de kun bsres te chu yis sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-5: gzhan rnams kun ni so sor gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-6: rtsa ba ji bzhin rim pas gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-7: rang gnas phyin pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-8: 'khor lo la ni snod gcig brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-9: slob dpon la ni dum bu gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-10: 'bad pa yis ni bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-11: rang gi tshogs la sbyin mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-12: rang dbang bskur ba'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-13: gzhon gyi yan lag phyag rgyas gar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-14: g-yon gyi lag pas mchod pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-15: g-yon gyi rkang pas bsnun byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-16: g-yon mig gis ni blta bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-17: gal te re zhig de'i dus su rnal 'byor mas brtag pa'i don gyi phyir 'ongs na 'jigs par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-18: seng+ge lta bu'i tshul gyis yongs su brtag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-19: de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma kun gzugs sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-20: phyag rgya sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-21: skad sna tshogs pa rab tu byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-22: gang gi tshe dang por rgyang ring po nas ha ha ra dgod pa de'i tshe khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-23: de'i dus su ha'i yig 'bru lnga sgra chen pos brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:21b-24: cung zad nye bar 'ongs na aa la la zhes smra bar bya'o; ;gang gi tshe phrad tsam na lag pa bskor na de'i tshe gyen du lag pa'i dbyug pa sgreng ba'i mdzub mo sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-0: gang gi tshe smin ma 'byed na de'i tshe 'jigs par lce bsgril bar @22a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-1: bya'o; ;gang gi tshe stang du lta ba de'i tshe g-yon brkyang bas sa mnan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-2: gang gi tshe rgyab nas lta ba de'i tshe g-yas brkyang bas mnan par bya'o; ;gang gi tshe rnam par dgod pa de'i tshe phem ka ra zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-3: gang gi tshe du ba de'i tshe bgad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-4: gang gi tshe gar byed pa de'i tshe stod khengs bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-5: gang gi tshe skra bkrol ba de'i tshe gtsug phud dgrol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-6: gang gi tshe gos bor bar byed pa de'i tshe langs te gci ba gtang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-7: gang gi tshe gci ba 'thung ba de'i tshe rkang pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong gis rtsa btog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-8: gang gi tshe gtam 'dri ba de'i tshe smra bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-9: gang gi tshe 'phrug pa de'i tshe ral pa mdud par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-10: gang gi tshe dpral bar reg pa de'i tshe steng gi mtshams kyi mthar reg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-11: gang gi tshe rna bar reg pa de'i tshe mgrin pa la reg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-12: gang gi tshe sna la reg pa de'i tshe lce phyir dbyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-13: gang gi tshe mgrin pa ston pa de'i tshe lag pa brkyang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-14: gang gi tshe nu ma ston pa de'i tshe mig srub bskyod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-15: gang gi tshe lte ba ston pa de'i tshe se gol sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-16: gang gi tshe rked pa sgul ba de'i tshe mtshan bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22a-17: gang gi tshe rkang pa rkyong ba de'i tshe mthe'u chung gnyis ga gdang bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-0: mdzub mos mig kyang de bzhin @22b no; ;sna'i phur ma bar ma'i lce phyir dbyung bar bya zhing g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkyang sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-1: gang gi tshe sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bstan pa de'i tshe 'khor lo bcu'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-2: gang gi tshe yi ge'i don brjod pa de'i tshe yi ges lan brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-3: gang gi tshe phyir brjod pa de'i tshe sha'i lan smra bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-4: gang gi tshe rgyal mtshan zhes smra ba de'i tshe mtshan zhes slar brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-5: gang gi padma brjod pa de'i tshe mngal zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-6: gang gi tshe gshol zhes smra ba de'i tshe lag pa zhes brjod par bya'o; ;gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i len pa de'i tshe sha li zhes smra bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-7: gang gi tshe tshon rtsi brjod pa de'i tshe zan zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-8: gang gi tshe srog ces brjod pa de'i tshe ch zla zhes smra bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-9: gang gi tshe rnyed pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe yid ces bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-10: gang gi tshe mi dga' ba brjod pa de'i tshe lam bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-11: gang gi tshe khro ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe chang btung zhing slar brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-12: gang gi tshe mdo pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe ngal bso zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-13: gang gi tshe bstan pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe gnyid ces smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-14: gang gi tshe dus brjod pa de'i tshe dga' ba zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-15: gang gi tshe zla ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe gos zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:22b-16: gang gi tshe nyi ma dran no zhes brjod pa de'i tshe skom zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-1: me zhes brjod pa de'i tshe grib ma zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-2: gang gi tshe nya zhes brjod pa de'i tshe 'ong zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-3: gang gi tshe glu'i sgra brjod pa de'i tshe gser zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-4: gang gi tshe sa le sbram zhes smra ba de'i tshe khyer ces smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-5: gang gi tshe ro zhes brjod pa de'i tshe sa zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-6: gang gi tshe nga rgyal ces brjod pa de'i tshe rlung zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-7: gang gi tshe mtsho zhes smra ba de'i tshe legs zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-8: gang gi tshe mda' zhes brjod pa de'i tshe khrims 'chal zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-9: gang gi tshe chags pa'i sgra byed pa de'i tshe 'ong zhes smra'o; ;gang gi tshe'o mas zhes brjod pa de'i tshe song zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-10: gang gi tshe ser sna zhes brjod pa de'i tshe grub ces smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-11: gang gi tshe nya la zhes brjod pa de'i tshe med ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-12: gang gi tshe 'bru zhes brjod pa de'i tshe yang dag ces smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-13: gang gi tshe rgyas pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe dri chu ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-14: gang gi tshe ri bong zhes brjod pa de'i tshe dri chen zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-15: gang gi tshe bshol zhes brjod pa de'i tshe khrag ces smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-16: gang gi tshe grangs zhes smra ba de'i tshe khu ba zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-17: gang gi tshe zla ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe dga' ba phrad ces smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-18: gang gi tshe ba la sha zhes brjod pa de'i tshe ngal zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23a-19: gang gi tshe sindhu brjod pa de'i tshe mi khom zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-0: rang rang gi yi ge'i @23b rtsa ba'i don shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-1: bud med gang zhig rkang lag chen po de ni g-yon du gtang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-2: bud med gang zhig mig ser zhing sna nyams pa de dag g-yas kyi char gtang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-3: bud med gang zhig sna ring la lag pa dang sor mo ring ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-4: spu mang ba de dag gi mdun du se gol gsum sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-5: bud med gang zhig kha dog nag cing gsus khyim smad du 'phyang la nu ma 'jol zhing so che ba de dag gi mdun du gci ba gtang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-6: bud med gang zhig skra ser zhing mig zlum la sen mo ring ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-7: mgrin pa ring ba de dag gi mdun du gad rgyangs chen po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-8: bud med gang zhig tsam pa'i me tog ltar dkar zhing skad 'jam la mig ring ba so ri lta bu dri zhim po la dga' zhing bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-10: mnyam par ma gzhag par de lta bu byed pa de'i mdun du cang mi smra bar sa la lta zhing myur ba myur bar g-yon ngos su 'gro bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-11: de lta bu'i dus su snying po'i sngags zlos shing phreng ba bgrang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-12: bud med gang zhig sor mo gcig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-13: mdzub mo brkyang ste gzugs su sngon po dga' bar lta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-14: gos dpung pa'i ngos su 'phyang ba smin ma'i dbus na dngos su phyag rgya padma'i dbyibs sam 'khri shing ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:23b-15: yang na aa sho ka gnyen po'i rtse mo dang 'dra ba mjug ma de dang lhan cig 'bad pas 'dus pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-0: @24a *// thams cad 'grub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-2: dga' ba chen po skyed par byed pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-3: de dang lhan cig gtor ma chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du rgya chen po'i sems kyis rtog pa med par sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-4: shin tu rgya che'i snod dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-5: cho ga yis ni dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-6: dbus su dpal ldan 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-7: sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-8: khrag chen pos ni yang dag bkang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-9: ka b'a la ni phyag g-yas su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-10: lha chen sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan; ;langs pa phyag ni g-yon pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-11: nag po me yi drag po shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-12: nag po chen po lho phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-13: nub kyi phyogs su 'jigs byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-14: drag po chen po byang gi phyogs //
