K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-15: me yi mtshams drag ral pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-16: chu bdag mtshams su dbyug nag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-17: rlung gi mtshams su ro langs drag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-18: dbang ldan he ru ka ni nag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-35: g-yas bskor g-yon bskor sdud pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24a-36: snod rlon par rim pas bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-0: de'i phyi rol tu @24b 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad chogs mang po dang bcas pas bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-1: klu chen po brgyad pho nya dang pho nya mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-2: tse ta [?] dang na [?] tse ti 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-11: gdug ngan can grangs med pa dza:h'um bam ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-13: dam tshig bskyang bar mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-15: bdag gi las thams cad grub par mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-18: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-19: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-23: phyag rgya'i brda zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-25: bcom ldan ye shes rgyal dbang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-26: dkyil 'khor mdor ni bstan pa gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-27: 'di ru nges bstan ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-28: mnga' bdag chen po nyid bka' stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-30: dkyil 'khor gyi ni des bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:24b-31: ji bzhin de nyid dpa' bo nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-1: gsungs pa yi rgyud don las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-2: a'a li k'a li bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-3: m'am h'um gnyis la thig le'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-4: de gnyis las ni gri gug pad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-5: ye shes me 'od las ye shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-6: snying po'i bdag nyid zhu las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-7: char sprin dang ni mnyam pa'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-8: phyag ni brgyad gnyis pa yis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-9: bcu drug phyed kyi zhal 'jigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-10: zhabs bzhi yis ni rab tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-11: nyi shu rtsa bzhi spyan gyis phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-12: gi mug gsum gyi mun nag 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-13: dkar po ser po dmar po'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-14: steng zhang bung ba'i byad gzugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-15: g-yon brkyang g-yang brkyang zhabs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-16: 'jigs byed zla nyi shin tu mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-17: 'jigs byed ma ldan ka ph'a la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-18: khrag gis bkang ba phyag na bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-19: zhi pa'i pags pa na bza' mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-20: phyag gnyis kyis ni gyen du brkyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-21: tshangs pa'i pags pas sham thabs byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-22: phyag rgya drug gis sku la bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-23: phyag rgya che dang gnyis med sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-24: gar dang ldan pa'i tshangs spyod bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-25: tshangs pa'i g-yul sa bye ba gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-26: tshangs pa'i g-yul sa'i zhal gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-27: phyag rgya chen po nam mkha' sngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-28: phyag gnyis pa ni na bza' grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-29: gri gug snod bsnams zhi ba'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-30: spyan gsum pa dang skra grol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25a-31: mgrin par 'khyud pa gsang ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-0: dga' bo la ni rang bzhin @25b bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-1: dpa' bo mchog gi rnam pa dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-2: sna tshogs rdo rje'i ral pas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-3: mgon po sna tshogs zla cod pan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-4: sna tshogs tshangs pa'i tshad dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-5: sna tshogs padma'i gad nal bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-6: sna tshogs bdag nyid sna tshogs 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-7: sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-8: sna tshogs mgo bo'i phreng bas mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-9: sna tshogs gar gyi ro dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-10: sna tshogs ga ti mug gcod par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-11: sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul bdag nyid mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-13: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-14: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma yis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-15: 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-16: shing gi rgyal po brgyad kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-18: lha yi dbang phyug 'dir bdag rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-20: ji ltar bdag gis rol pa 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-21: de ru re zhig rim par dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-22: rtse gcig sems kyis khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-23: dang por re zhig 'phar ma gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-24: sgo la sogs pa ka bas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-25: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kyi rim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-26: lha yi dbang phyug bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-27: sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma'i shar gyi aoodyan gyi gnas su nam mkha' dri med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-28: zla ba kha dog nag po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-29: byang du dza landha rar shin tu stobs chen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:25b-31: nub tu pu l'i rar lha'i dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-2: lhor k'a ma ru bar gsang ba'i bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-3: rlung za ma autpa la sngon po'i mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-4: me mtshams su ma la wa re nye bar gnas su 'od drag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-6: gnod sbyin gyi mtshams su sindhu'i yul du nyi dgra dang [?] snying po'i 'dab ma sku mdog padma sngon po dang 'dra ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-7: rlung gi mtshams su n'a ga rar mchod dga' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-8: bag yod thor cog ma zla ba ltar dkar mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-9: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su thams cad kyi byed pa po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-10: nyi 'dul ma nyi ma'i 'od lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-11: shar sgor mum mu ni'i zhing du autpa la'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-12: zhi ba 'chi ba'i pho nya mo sngon mo chen mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-13: byang sgor de pi ko tir zhi ba chen po'i bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-14: ljang brtson ma gur gum gyi mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-15: nub sgor nye zhing ku lu tar nag po 'dul ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-16: 'od bdun ma dud pa nag po'i mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-17: lho sgor aurpu dar rmad du byung ba dpa' mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-18: tshangs pa ma du ba'i mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-19: shar lho'i mtshams su tshando ha ha ri ki la bar drag chen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-20: khyab 'jug ma sprin gyi mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-21: byang mtshams su ku ta bar dregs 'joms dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-22: kha ma gser gyi mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-23: nub mtshams su nye ba'i tshando ha l'am ba kar ri rab brtan ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26a-24: thams cad skyed byed ma dmar nag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-0: lho mtshams su @26b kanytsi kar nam mkha'i zhal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-1: dpa' bo'i yum gser gyis mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-2: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i 'khyud pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-6: zhal bzhi dang phyag bzhin kha tv'am ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-10: sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan padma'i steng du 'jigs byed kyi gdan la rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis zla ba dang nyi ma zhabs kyis mnan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-11: me'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na nyi ma bye ba'i 'od bas gsal ba snang bar spro ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-12: 'phar ma gnyis par sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-13: sgo dang rta babs la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-14: dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-15: de'i shar gyi 'dab mar 'dus pa'i gnas las kyi yul du skam pa ma sprin mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-16: byang du gser gyi gling du 'jigs ma kha dog dmar mo chen mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-17: nub tu nye ba'i 'dus pa ku lu tar 'od ma dmar mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-18: lhor bindur mchu 'phyad ma pa la ksha'i mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-19: me'i mtshams su dur khrod du yi dogs 'dus par ri rab so ma zla ba'i mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-20: gnod sbyin gyi mtshams chu dogs su dus kyi bde ba mar me'i 'od kyi mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:26b-21: rlung mtshams nye ba'i dur khrod du tsa ri trar nyi mig ma gser mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-0: dbang ldan gyi mtshams gzhon nu'i grong khyer @27a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-1: du me'i zhal ma gser btso ma'i mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-2: shar sgor pi la pa kasmi rar 'dod pa ma ser mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-3: byang sgor ki ra tar lce ring ma dkar mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-4: nub sgor nye ba'i pi ba nee pa lar chos dkar ma zla ba ltar dkar mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-5: lho sgor kam pa dzar bden mdog ma mar ka ta'i mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-6: shar mtshams lam gnas shar gyi lus 'phags su mig stong pa rdo rje sa la'i mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-7: byang mtshams su byang gi sgra mi snyan du stag mo beed'urya'i mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-8: nub mtshams su ba lang spyod du gtum mo mu sa ra ba'i mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-9: lho mtshams su nye ba'i lam 'dzam bu'i gling du 'dod pa'i gzugs ma sna tshogs mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-10: rnal 'byor ma thams cad zhal bzhi ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-13: skra dang na bza' grol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-18: ro'i steng du g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-19: yang na rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs su rang 'od kyi thabs la 'khyud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-20: rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-21: de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-22: rgyud kun du ni rnyed par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-23: lus dang bha ga byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-24: dkyil 'khor gsum ni rab mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-25: yang na snying po dkyil 'khor bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-26: rang gi bde ba len pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27a-27: ma yi yig 'bru mdud par brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-0: na yi yig 'bru @27b lte bar dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-1: da yi yig 'bru ge sar dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-3: ma yi yig 'bru rin chen grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-4: na yi yig 'bru mdud par brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-5: da yi yig 'bru ring po'i dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-6: la yi yig 'bru khar brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-7: ma yi yig 'bru shu kra'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-8: na yi yig 'bru zhu ba'i dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-10: la yi yig 'bru bde ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-11: ma ni snang ba'i 'du shes grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-12: na ni yig 'bru snang ba mched //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-13: da ni snang ba snang ba thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-14: la ni yang dag dri med mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-15: ma yi yig 'bru dga' bar grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-16: na yi yig 'bru mchog tu dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-17: da yi yig 'bru dga' bral dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-18: la ni lhan cig skyes par dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-19: ma yi yig 'bru sa zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-20: na yi yig 'bru chu ru bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-21: da yi yig 'bru de ni me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-22: la yi yig 'bru rlung gi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-23: g-yo ba'i phyir na rlung du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-24: yang na khyab pa'i phyir ni dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-25: ye shes rnyed pa yi ni phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-26: bde ba yi ni chen po len //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-27: ye shes ngo bo bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-28: dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-29: dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rin chen gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-30: thig le'i ngo bo yi ge bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-31: rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-32: phyag rgya dang ni sngags dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-33: sngags chen kun dga' ra ba'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-34: dbyangs dang gsal byed dang bral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:27b-35: dri ma med pa bcos ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-2: yang dag dri med gnas dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-3: rang bzhin grags pa skye med mkha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-4: dpa' bo'i ngo bor grags pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-5: rnam pa kun tu yang dag bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-8: dpa' bo 'chad dang nyan pa bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-9: byed dang 'phrog dang mnga' bdag bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-10: chos kun gyi ni rang ngo bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-11: stong dang snying rje gnyis su med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-12: stong pa chen po rang ngo grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-13: gang du mi dmigs pa ni bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-14: dngos po ma yin bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-15: dngos bdag de yang de nyid min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-16: dngos dang dngos min rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-17: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-18: dngos dang dngos med gnyis las 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-19: dngos dang dngos med nang yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-20: bur shing gi ni ro ji bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-21: ji ltar til gyi nang gi mar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-22: ji ltar shing gi nang gi me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-23: de bzhin thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-24: 'on kyang ye shes sems dpa' yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-26: bdag 'dzin pa ni nyon mongs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-27: sems can don las nye bar nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-28: sems can don las bsod nams gzhan; ;che ba gang na yang ni med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-29: rang don sgrub la bsod nams min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-30: skyes bu chen pos 'di lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28a-31: rang don ma rung ba ni dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-0: gzhan la sdang nyams nyan thos @28b sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-1: rang don gti mug 'dzin pas non //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-2: sems can don la rgyab kyis phyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-3: grub pa chen po 'dod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-4: de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-5: de la gtam yang mi bya ste; ;thabs dang mi ldan 'jigs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-6: mgo la nor bus brgyan kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-7: sbrul nag bzhin du dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-8: nyan thos de dang nam yang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-9: de bas mu stegs 'dus pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-10: ji ltar mthing shing snod chags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-11: de ni gang du'ang dgos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-12: de bzhin nyan thos tshul khrims nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-13: gang tshe rang gi chos kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-14: lta ba bstan kyang dri ma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-15: de tshe de la dgos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-16: byang chub sems dpa' khrims nyams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-17: de la ltung ba 'byung ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-18: yang dag lta dang gzhan don can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-19: de 'dra'i thabs dang ldan pas na; ;nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-20: chu yis padma ji bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-21: mu stegs pa'am nyan thos la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-22: dman yang de la smad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-23: ye shes dkyil 'khor mthar phyin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-24: dad pas de dag mchod mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-25: phyi yi 'phar ma gcig gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-27: rtag tu me tog spos la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-28: sngags 'di yis ni mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-29: aom ni dang por h'um phat mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-30: bar du ming ni spel bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-31: sna tshogs lnga yi mchod sbyin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:28b-32: dkyil 'khor sa la rab tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-2: grub pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-3: dpal ye shes thig le las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-4: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-5: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-6: ye shes nyi ma bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-8: gang zhig bdag ni ci zhu ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-9: bdag la thugs rje chen pos gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-14: gnas kyi mdor bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-16: gtor ma chen po'i rim pas 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la nges pa'i don bstan pa bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-18: sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-19: nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-20: dga' ba la sogs pa las 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-21: yid ni sngags zhes brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-22: yang ni srub dang bsrub pa'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-23: sngags ni bdud rtsir bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-24: lam gyi thar pa de ni sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-25: tshigs rgyas pa ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29a-26: phrad pa gnyis kyi dbus na gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-0: de ni don dam @29b pa yi sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-1: sngags ni a'a li k'a li yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-2: brjod pa de ni bzlas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-3: bskyed dang rdzogs dang bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-4: sngags kyi bzlas par rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-5: gang du ske dang rkan ni gnyis; ;bskyod pa gang du mi 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-6: srog gi rtsa ba'i nang yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-7: lugs dang lugs min rgyun mi 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-8: thig le gsum dang yig gsum dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-9: rang 'od ma bcos brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-10: rkan gyi nang du lce 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-11: ro ma yis ni mnan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-12: yang ni rtse mo'i cha yis reg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-13: mnyam sbyor rnam pa'i bsam gtan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-14: grags pa yod pa'i bdud rtsi bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-16: sprul pa'i rim pa'i bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-17: thig le drangs pa bde ba'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-18: mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor gyis ni brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-19: de yi bskyed rim bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-20: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-21: dgyes pa'i gnas bsten mchod sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-22: mchod dga' 'byung ba'i mchod sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-23: rab kyi dkyil 'khor de ru bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-24: mchog gi dga' ba 'khor bar bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-25: k'a li ye shes mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-26: sku brgyad bdag nyid mchod sbyin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-27: gnas brgyad par ni mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-29: de yi don ni bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-30: sum cu rtsa gnyis yig gzugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:29b-31: k'a li'i thig les gtso bo'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-2: lha mo bcas pas mchod bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-3: lha mo kun dang gnas la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-4: lha yi dbang phyug skyabs yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-5: lha mo 'di ru rtsa yin te; ;'byung ba dang ni gnas sa byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-6: skyabs las rnam par rdzogs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-7: mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-8: gru gsum dbus su bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-9: autpa la sngon bo'i mdog dang 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-10: sna tshogs padma'i gdan dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-11: bdud bzhi yi ni steng na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-12: zhal ni bcu drug phyag bcu drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-13: zhal ni so sor spyan gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-14: ser po dmar po ljang gu'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-15: ri bong can ni g-yon bskor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-16: zhal gzhan kun ni bung ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-18: gshin rje'i pags pas rnam dkris byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-19: dam bcas don phyir brtul zhugs don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-20: sangs rgyas phreng ba'i do shal byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-21: mgo bo yi ni chun 'phyang brgyan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-22: gar dgu yi ni ro dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-23: sku ni phyag rgya drug gis mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-24: sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-26: ye shes mkha' 'gro bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-27: legs dgyes dbang mo gnyis med sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-28: dur khrod kyi ni thal bas byugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-29: rten du bgrad pas bde bar bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-30: g-yas brkyang ba yi gar dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30a-31: gsang ba'i don gnas ba rda byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-0: mkha' @30b 'gro ma yi tshogs kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-1: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-2: rdo rje dril bu gnyis med sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-3: tshangs pa yi ni pags pas bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-4: mda' gzhu 'khor lo rin po che; ;ral gri rtse gsum rde'i chung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-5: zla ba nyi ma sta re snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-6: kha tv'am ga dang thod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-8: yang na phyag ni gnyis ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-10: zhi ba spyan ni gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-11: nang gi 'phar ma dgyes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-12: zla ba gang ba bzhin du bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-13: sna tshogs padma yi ni gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-14: 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-15: phyi ma gru bzhi ru ni grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-16: sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-17: yi dvags chen po'i phreng bas ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-18: sna tshogs dpa' bos nye bar mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-19: sna tshogs pa yi shing gis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-20: sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-21: de'i nang du gru gsum gyi phyag rgya'i grva ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-27: spyi bor legs dgyes rdo rje ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:30b-29: rdo rje glang chen ma bcom ldan 'das la skul par byed cing phyag gi 'phar ma 'bar bar ro mchog chen po'i snod kyis mchod sbyin 'bul bar byed cing tshangs pa'i bu gar rtse sbyar gyi phyag rgya byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-0: mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sprel te lhag mas mthe bong mnan na @31a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-1: mdzub mo sbyar ba 'og tu bcings pa'i sku'i yi dvags chen po'i steng na g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-3: skra grol zhing na bza' grol ba; chu skyes rgyas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-4: bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-5: shar gyi phyogs su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar k'a ma ru pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-7: de'i shar gyi 'dab mar m'a la wa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-11: nub kyi 'dab mar na ga ra ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-12: rna ba gnyis su 'jigs byed ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-15: byang mtshams su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar mummu ni ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-17: de'i shar gyi 'dab mar de wi ko ti ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-18: ske'i gling bur rta mgrin ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-19: byang gi 'dab mar ku lu ta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-20: rgyab kyi gling bur rta rna ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-21: nub kyi 'dab mar aarbu ta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-22: nu ma gnyis su glang chen sna ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-23: lho'i 'dab mar ta li ki li ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-24: snying gar glang chen lto ba ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-25: nub phyogs kyi sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lta bar go da wa ri ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-26: lte ba'i gnas su me ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-27: de'i shar gyi 'dab ma lam pa ka ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31a-28: gsang ba'i padmar chu rgyun ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-0: byang gi 'dab mar @31b kanytsi ka ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-1: mtshan gyi dbus su ri bong can ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-2: nub kyi 'dab mar las kyi yul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-5: bshang kha'i gnas su dung sna ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-6: lho phyogs kyi padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar kongka na ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-7: brla gnyis su dung gtsug ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-9: pus mo gnyis su dung lte pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-10: byang gi 'dab mar yi dvags 'dus pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-11: rje ngar gnyis su stobs chen ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-12: nub kyi 'dab mar rgya mtsho'i ngogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-13: rkang pa gnyis su bya rgod ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-14: lha'i 'dab mar tsa ri tra ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-15: sor mo la rgod kha ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-16: de'i sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bzhi'i 'dab ma la dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-17: 'dab ma lhag ma ku la khrag chen pos shin tu gang ba'i k'a pa la dang ldan pa'i sna tshogs chen po'i bum pa kha rgyan btsugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-18: bdud rtsi chen pos lto ba gang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-19: der sna tshogs kyis mgrin pa mtho bar bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-20: shar mtshams su ku mar pu ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-22: mthe bong dang lus thams cad la hor pa ma dang hor mig ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-23: byang mtshams su ke ra ta dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-25: rkang pa gnyis la lhag par hor mgo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-27: nub mtshams su kam pu dza dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:31b-30: snying gar mig dmar dang srog ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-1: su byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ba lang spyod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-3: sprul pa'i snying por 'dzin ma dang ro ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-4: 'dzam bu'i gling du gdegs pa'i padma'i snar bcom ldan 'das dang aa wa dh'u ti'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-6: nang gi 'phar mas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na yod pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag par phyi ma phyi mar rgyud kyi go rim rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang gi dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug phyi rol tu mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa; rnam pa dang bcas pa brgyad gnyis kyi lo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-8: byad gzugs mdzes pa chen po'i sha rgyas pas dregs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-12: sra zhing mtho ba'i nu ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-13: rus pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-15: g-yon brkyang pas ro'i steng na gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-19: bdud grangs med pa 'joms pa kho na sku mdog sna tshogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-21: thugs rje chen pos sems can 'gugs ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-22: sems can gyi don mdzad pa la brtson pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32a-23: brel ba dang mi mkhyen pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-0: phyi'i 'phar ma shar dang byang dang nub dang lho mtshams @32b re rer nang gi lha mo bzhin du lha mo gnyis gnyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-12: lho'i sgo re rer sgo skyong ma gnyis gnyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-13: de dag kyang dregs pa chen po 'jigs pa chen mo mchog gi legs dgyes kyis rings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-14: sna tshogs kyi nyams kyis sku khyab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-15: shar sgor rdo rje ro langs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-16: rdo rje dra ba ma sku mdog nag po phyag bzhi ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-17: mda' gzhu 'gengs shing chu srin dang nya bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-18: ka p'e la dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-22: mi'i rus pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-24: mgo po'i chun 'phyang rgyu ma las brgyus pa 'chang pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-25: byang sgor rdo rje rtse mo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-26: de bzhin du rdo rje zlum pa ma sku mdog ser mo seng+ge dang bya khyung bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-27: nub sgor rdo rje ske rags ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-28: rdo rje ser mo ma sku mdog dmar mo gling bu dang rdza rnga chen po'i sgra kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-29: lho sgor rdo rje dgod ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-30: rdo rje nyi ma mo sku mdog ljang gu rdza rnga dang pi wang gi rol mo'i sgra kho na ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:32b-31: ji ltar shar sgor bzhugs pa'i rnal 'byor ma de ltar thams cad kyang rus pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-1: spyod kyi 'khor lo'i nang na yod pa'i rtsa brgyad gnyis kyi grangs ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-2: de dag kun gyi rnam par dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-3: sku brgyad bdag nyid kyi ni mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-4: mchod sbyin sgra yis kun tu brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-5: mchod pa de ni mchod sbyin brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-6: rtsa ni kun gyi gnas rab mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-7: gnas ni gdan la sogs pa'i dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-8: gnas kun gyi ni bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-9: gsang chen dag pa padma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-10: 'dab ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-11: bde ba yi ni yangs pa'i sar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-12: rtsa yi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-13: gnas ni gdan la bya bar grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-14: gnas ni rten du brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-15: bde ba 'byung ba'i ngal sos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-16: de yi zhing ni don dam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-17: bde ba'i ye shes 'byung ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-18: tshando har ni 'di ru bshad; ;thig le gsum gyi ye shes bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-19: gcig byed pa yi gtan tshigs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-20: de yi 'dus sar bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-21: rnal 'byor rgyud du rnyed dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-22: gang du tshor ba yod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-23: bde ba 'byung ba'i thim de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-24: de ni 'di ru dur khrod brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-25: yang na bde ba'i rnam shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-26: gang du bde ba yang dag rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-27: de ni pi la ba ru grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-28: skye dang thim pa'i ye shes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-29: gang du bde ba'i zla ba skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-30: de ni lam rab tu ni bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-31: 'gro ba'i bdag nyid lam yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33a-32: bde ba'i rgyal po gang zhig 'gog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-0: de ni sbyor @33b ba'i ye shes rab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-1: de ni gnas brgyad dgyes pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-2: sku brgyad rang gi ngo bo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-3: ye shes brgyad kyi bdag nyid bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-5: rtsa kun gyi ni dag pa'i gzhi; ;de la yang ni rtsa kun gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-6: nye ba'i gnas ni thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-7: lha yi dbang phyug rnam par smin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-8: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-9: thig le drug ni rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-10: thig le'i dbus na ye shes yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-11: dag gi lam gyis rnyed par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-12: bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-13: drug min de bzhin gsum ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-14: gsum dang bral ba gsum par grags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-15: ye shes rang bzhin de skyed med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-16: nyi ma'i thig le'i ye shes shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-17: 'bad pa yis ni mchod sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-18: gang tshe mchog byung ma shar bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-20: zla ba de ni dga' bral dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-21: chags pa 'di ru thim par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-22: nyi ma'i dbus nas zla ba 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-23: zla ba'i dbus nas nyi ma 'char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-24: dri ma med phyir yangs par 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-25: shes rab bdag nyid gzugs kyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-26: thams cad la ni tshim par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-27: thams cad kyi ni skye ba'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-28: 'bras bu byed pa'i bdag nyid zla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-29: rgyu byed bdag nyid zla ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-31: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-32: bde ba chags chen bdag nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:33b-33: chags pa chen po dngos med na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-2: tha mal bde nyid bde ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-3: byol song bag chags rab rmongs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-4: dbang po gnyis kyi bde bar 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-5: bde ba mchog gi rang rig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-6: chags pa dang ni chags bral med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-7: bde ba thig le'i nang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-8: char yang nang du bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-9: de gnyis ye shes tshul gyi nang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-10: rnam par shes pa'i tshul can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-11: rnam par shes dang ye shes bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-12: gzhan dang gzhan min nang yod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-13: sbyor drug gyes ba rnam par shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-14: char yang rtsa ba kun brtag bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-15: rtog pa spangs pa de nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-17: tshor bya tshor byed gnyis las grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-18: srid dang mya ngan 'das dag pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-19: de ni gsang chen de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-20: gang du yang ni gsal ma byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-21: 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-22: smra bar mi bya gang la lar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-23: rnal 'byor rgyud du mos gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-24: lha yi dbang phyug gsal mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-25: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-26: sngags kyi bzlas pa'i rim pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-27: mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-28: dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-31: de kho na nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-32: de nas mchod pa'i cho ga 'di'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34a-33: nges par bstan pa bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-0: @34b thim dang longs spyod dag gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-2: zla ba nyi ma me tog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-3: sku yi rgyal po nyid la mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-5: mar ngo tshes kyi dang po dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-7: nges par aa yi thig le las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-8: thim pa 'di yis tshes gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-9: bdud rtsi 'di ni smin phrag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-11: a'a li'i thig le gnyis pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-12: bde ba'i mkhur tshos gnyis nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-13: tshes gsum pa la longs spyod 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-14: de la rnam par smin pas 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-15: a'a li'i thigs pa gsum pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-16: bdud rtsi kos ko'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-17: tshes bzhi pa la thim pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-18: de la mgu ba las dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-19: bzhi pa'i ye shes thig les so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-20: bde ba yi ni mgrin gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-21: tshes lnga pa la longs spyod 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-22: de la dgyes pas rgyas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-23: thig le lnga pa'i khengs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-24: 'dod pa brang gi gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-25: tshes drug pa la thim pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-26: de la bsam gtan las drag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-27: thig le drug la gang bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-28: bde ba'i nu ma'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-29: tshes bdun pa la dbang ni 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-30: de la bdun pas 'byung ba yin; ;thigs pa bdun pas khengs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-31: 'dod pa'i rtsi ba logs gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-32: tshes brgyad pa la thim pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:34b-33: de la chags pas mchog gi dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-2: bde ba'i lte ba'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-3: tshes dgu pa la longs spyod 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-5: thig le dgu pa khengs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-6: 'dod pa'i mdoms kyi gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-7: tshes bcu pa la thim pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-8: de la brtan las thig ler 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-9: thig ler bcu pa gang bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-10: bde ba'i spyi bo'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-11: bcu gcig pa la dbang ni 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-12: de yi stobs las myos par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-13: bcu gcig thig le khengs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-14: bde ba'i rdo rje'i rtsa gnas su; ;bcu gnyis tshes la thim pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-15: de la 'od las dga' bral dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-16: bcu gnyis thig le gang bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-17: rgyas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-18: bcu gsum tshes la longs spyod 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-19: de las snang bas aur tar 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-20: a'a li'i bcu gsum thig les so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-21: bde ba'i mdud pa'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-22: bcu bzhi pa la thim ba shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-23: de la reg bya las chur 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-24: bcu bzhi'i zla ba'i thig les so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-25: bde ba'i nor bu'i dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-26: nya gang ba las dbang ni shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-27: de las phrad las gnyid du 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-28: bco lnga pa yi thig les so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-29: dbang po bcu drug pa yi cha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-30: gzhan ni gang du'ang mi dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-31: de bzhin du ni so sor gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35a-32: rang bzhin de ni yod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-0: dga' @35b ba'i bye brag lhan skyes dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-1: bcu drug pa yi don du yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-2: char yang bcu drug 'di ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-3: yod pa ma yin med pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-4: de bzhin du ni ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-5: lha yi dbang phyug rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-6: g-yas g-yon yan lag gnyis su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-7: khu ba yi ni 'byung bar dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-8: mar ngo de bzhin yar ngo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-10: bcu dang lnga yis gnyis med sbyor; ;bde ba 'di yi 'byung ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-11: de nyid gsum shes bcu dang lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-12: shes rab dang bral bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-13: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-14: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-15: rtag tu mos pa yis ni shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-16: bsam gtan gyis ni shes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-17: bcu drug gi ni yi ge'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-18: a'a li'i thig le rang ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-20: a'a li'i ye shes bde bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-22: k'a li'i ye shes bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-23: a'a li k'a li gnyis sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-24: mchod sbyin gyis ni rab mchod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-25: mchod pa yang ni de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-26: gsang ba'i padma'i snying gar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-27: gsang ba de nyid gsum zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-28: la la mda' la gnyis sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-29: mchod sbyin gyi ni rab mchog bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-30: mchod pa yang ni de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-31: gsang ba'i padma'i snying gar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-32: gsang ba de nyid gsum zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-33: thim dang longs spyod sogs bye brag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:35b-34: thim pa dang ni longs spyod dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-2: de yi thig le gsum zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-3: sku gsum yig gsum bdag nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-4: tshangs pa'i bu ga de bzhin mgrin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-5: snying ga ru ni thig le gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-6: de yis bskyed pa'i rim shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-7: mdud pa'i nang ni man chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-8: bzlog ba yi ni thig le gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-9: gyen du rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-10: rgyu 'bras rnam dag bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-11: thig le drug ni rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-12: dri med ye shes char yang drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-13: de ni rnam shes sbyor drug bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-14: de yi dbus su de nyid bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-15: lhan skyes dga' ba'i bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-16: mchod pa'i las sbyor che ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-17: the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-18: mchod pa'i dam tshig dus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-19: gsang ba'i sgra ni 'bad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-20: gang zhig 'dod pa grub pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-21: dam tshig sems dpar brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-22: la la rdo rje la la pad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-23: a'a li zla ba k'a li nyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-24: ri bong can ni khu ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-25: nyi ma khrag tu rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-26: khu ba ga pur shes bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-27: khrag ni si hla zhes su dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-28: sbrul ni nag po gnyis ka yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-30: na ra ka p'a la ru brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-31: chags pa chad du rab tu grags; ;zhe sdang de ni sha yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-32: gti mug tshod ma ru ni dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-33: nga rgyal 'di ru sha chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36a-34: zan ni phrag dog nyid du dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-0: mtho ris @36b gzugs zhes dran pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-1: mi yi yul ni sgra zhes bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-3: dri ni ri rab rtse mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-4: gling bzhi po ni reg bya 'o; ;sa ni pha ru rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-5: chu ni sring mo yin par dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-6: me ni yum ste bu mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-7: rlung du rab tu grags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-8: nam mkha' sgyug mor shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-9: bcings pa med pa nam mkha' yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-10: skal ldan ma yin krung krung mo; ;skal ldan dang pa 'on pa mtshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-11: 'on pa min pa rgya mtshor brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-12: dbang bskur grong khyer pa ru dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-13: dbang bskur min pa grong pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-14: gsang ba snying ga yin par brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-15: khyer shog dri ma med par brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-16: gsal byed nam mkha' yin par dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-17: gzhang kha dgyes pa dam di 'bras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-18: ma rungs lcags su kun tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-19: stan ni padma yin par brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-20: sbyin pa ge sar dran pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-21: gzhon nu ma ni mtshe 'ur grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-22: rgan mo gtsang por dran pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-23: gnas pa rna ba zhes su brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-25: dus ni dbyug pa bde ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-26: thal ba min dga' dga' stobs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-27: de dag tshogs kyi mchod sbyin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-28: dus su 'bad pas brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-29: khrung khrung la sogs 'jug min phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-30: gsang ba'i tshig ni smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-32: shin tu dgyes pas gsang skad smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:36b-33: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-1: ba'i skad ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-2: dbang bskur la sogs nges bstan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-3: lha yi dbang phyug ngas 'dir bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-4: rgyud gsum gyi ni rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-5: dbang drug dbye ba bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-6: chu yi dbang bskur dbu rgyan dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-7: bya ba'i rgyud las rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-8: rdo rje dril bu de bzhin ming /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-9: spyod pa'i rgyud las rab tu gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-10: phyir mi ldog pa yi ni dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-11: rnal 'byor rgyud du gsal bar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-12: de ni drug gi bye brag dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-13: de ni slob dpon dbang zhes bya; ;rnal 'byor bla ma yi ni mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-14: gsang ba yi ni dbang rgyal bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-15: shes rab ye shes bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-16: bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-17: dgu yi bye brag dbang [?] la sogs; ;'bras bu'i phyir na brgyad dbyer 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-18: bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-19: shes rab ye shes de yi 'bras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-20: dngos po so sor shes mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-21: de ltar zhes ni tshad med do; ;de bas 'bras bu'i tshig don ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-22: rigs pa ma yin pa yi sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-23: de bzhin re zhig dga' ba'i sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-24: de bzhin re zhig dga' ba'i rim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-25: ji ltar bur ni yod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-26: dga' ba lus su grags pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-27: mchog tu dga' ba 'di ru gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-28: yid ni dga' bral shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37a-29: lhan skyes de ni gang na yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-0: kun na yod pa'i @37b ye shes sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-1: sems las gzhan ni yod pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-2: gang zhig ci zhig 'di thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-3: de ni thams cad sems yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-4: sems las thams cad 'byung ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-6: lus kyi mgo bo dga' ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-7: ngag gi mgrin pa mchog tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-8: sems ni snying gar shes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-9: chags pa'i dga' ba rtag tu shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-10: lus rgyu 'bras bu de ni ngag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-11: ngag ni rgyu ste 'bras bu yid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-12: yid nyid yongs su shes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-13: 'bras bu de ni don dam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-14: de nyid gsum bdag ye shes gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-15: rtsa gsum nang gi dbus na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-16: gnas gsum khyab pa skye ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-17: 'od gsum srid pa gsum dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-18: 'od rab gnas ni rab kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-19: de ni bzhi pa mchog gi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-20: bdun gnyis bye brag tu ni yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-21: yan lag rab kyi mdor bsdus la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-22: chu yi dbang bskur dga' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-23: gsang ba'i dbang bskur mgrin pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-24: mchog tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-25: shes rab ye shes kyi ni dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-26: snying ga ru ni dga' bral dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-27: gsang ba padma'i lte ba ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-28: bzhi pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-29: de ltar dbang ni bzhi ru dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-30: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-31: chu yi dbang ni mdoms su ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:37b-33: gsang ba'i dbang ni gnyis pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-1: ster; ;rdo rje yi ni rtsa ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-2: rtsa ba dang ni mdoms kyi 'og /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-3: shes rab ye shes kyi ni dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-4: mdud pa'i gnas su rtag tu dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-5: dbang rnams kun gyi bla ma'i bla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-7: shes rab ye shes nor bu'i khar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-9: rlung ma dang ni gnyid skyed rtsa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-10: gnyis ka rgyas pa yis ni bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-11: gyen gyi lam gyis bzlog par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-12: mdud pa'i nang gi gnas su 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-13: de ltar bzhi pa rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-14: mtshan nyid dang bral 'bras bur grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-15: mdud ba'i gnas su rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-16: tshangs pa'i sprul pa snying man chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-17: de tsam du ni lhan skyes dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-18: rlabs dang bral ba dpe med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-19: de ni de kun don dam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-20: dbang gi ye shes nges bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-21: rdo rje ka ba de bzhin gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-22: sdom dang sdom pa'i rgya mtsho dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-23: rigs chen ye shes snying po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-24: kye rdor 'jigs byed rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-25: mtshan dang gsang ba 'dus pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-26: lha yi dbang phyug bdag gis sbas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-27: khyod kyis ngor mdzad dbang gi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-28: rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-29: rtog ge ba dang rgan po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-30: dge slong mos par gnas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-31: yang dag lam shes slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-32: de rnams de nyid bshad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38a-33: aa yi yig 'bru dga' ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-0: bhi yi yig 'bru mchog tu @38b dga'; ;she yi yig 'bru dga' bral dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-1: ka yi yig 'bru lhan skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-2: gang du yang ni mi dmigs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-3: aa ni skye med rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-4: kun gyi rgyu ni yin phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-5: she yi yig 'brur yang dag brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-6: gtsug tor gsang ba'i padmar bhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-7: bskur dang khrus ni byed pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-8: ka ni rnam rtog dngos por grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-9: 'gro ba chad pa'i bdag nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-10: gsang ba'i padma'i snying ga aa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-11: rtsa kun gyis ni 'bigs pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-12: de phyir mngon par dga' ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-14: she bde ye shes kun brtag bral /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-15: yang dag don gyis gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-16: dang po'i dga' ba rgyu yi dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-17: aa yi yig 'bru mchog gi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-18: mchog dga' dga' bral dga' bar grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-19: dbang bskur rab tu grags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-20: de gnyis dbus su de nyid bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-21: rang bzhin dga' ba bzhi dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-22: mngon par dga' dang dga' bral dga'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-23: gang zhig rang bzhin mi shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-24: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-25: sangs rgyas yin yang mi bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-27: thams cad khyab par mnga' bdag bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-28: sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad yid ltar mgyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-30: thams cad kun gyi dbang phyug bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-31: 'byung ba kun gyi bdag nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:38b-32: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-1: bskur ba'i nges pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-2: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-3: nang gi mtshan nyid sbyin sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-4: kha ni hom khung dgang gzar lag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-5: tshul ni rang byung me yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-6: nga rgyal phrag dog bsreg rdzas yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-7: bzlas pa de ni kham du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-8: sa 'og dang ni sring mo mar; ;de yi bsreg rdzas rab tu dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-9: ye shes bdud rtsi rnam dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-10: phrag dog la sogs bsang gtor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-11: dum bu gsum pa'i snod mdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-12: phrag dog bdud rtsis rab tu tshim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-13: rdor gsum ye shes sa bon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-14: dag byas dkar byas rim gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-15: rlung mer bskul byas 'bar bar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-16: bdud rtsi mchog ni zhu bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-17: ha yi ma mo'i sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-18: 'khor lo drug ni rab tshim bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-19: ri bo'i ma mo dang bral bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-20: phyi nang rtag tu rab tshim bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-21: de lta'i sbyin sreg las kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-22: lha yi sku ru nges par 'gyur; ;lha yi sku ni bde chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-23: don dam par ni shes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-25: de ni don dam sbyin sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-26: dpa' bo gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-27: dus kyi gang du steng dbang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-28: lte snying bde ba'i padma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-29: rtag bar shes rab mas ni brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39a-30: de ni sbyin sreg bsreg rdzas ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-0: kun @39b rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-1: shes rab thabs ni phrad pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-2: sbyin sreg las kyi 'bras bu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-3: myur ba ru ni rnyed pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-4: hom khung dha la dgyes pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-5: la la 'di ru dgang gzar dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-6: blugs gzar gsang pad sna yi rtse //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-7: mar ni khu ba zla 'od mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-8: gsang pad zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-9: mar gyi snod du rnam par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-10: blugs gzar dgang gzar mar gyi snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-11: rtsa gsum du ni brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-12: bsrub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-13: rlung ma dang ni gnyid ma gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-14: gcig pa'i dngos po yang dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-15: ye shes me ni mchog tu 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-17: gzhan min bde chen man chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-18: mchog gi bdud rtsi rgyun ni 'dzag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-19: ji ltar mkha' las chu 'bab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-20: rtsa yi dra ba du ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-22: sku gsum ye shes rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-23: rtag tu bsreg rdzas mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-24: me yi kha ru dgang gzar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-25: mar gyis bkang pa dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-26: me ni mchog tu dga' ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-27: rnam rtog hom shing tshig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-28: mdud pa'i hom khung gi ni me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-29: de ni mchog tu dga' rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-30: zhi ba'i zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-31: longs spyod dang ni grol ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-32: sku yi rdo rje rin chen khar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-33: gsung gi rdo rje dbus kyi dkyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:39b-34: thugs kyi rdo rje mdud snying po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-0: dga' ba yis ni mchod par @40a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-1: bya; ;gsung gi rdo rje blugs gzar mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-2: dga' bral dga' ba sku rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-3: lhan skyes dga' ba'i ye shes kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-4: dgang blugs kyis ni mchod par bya; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-5: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kun brgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-7: de nas yun ring po zhig nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-8: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la 'dir ye shes yod dam ci zhes yang ya mtshan du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-9: yang de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das mas phyag rgya chen pos dam por 'khyud nas ma mchu btung ba'i bdud rtsi'i mchod sbyin phul te gsang ba'i padma'i bskor ba dam po'i snyim pa mnyam par sbyor ba bcings nas gus pas zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-10: sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-11: ye shes zab mo dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-12: ci yi don phyir de'i lta'i tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-13: 'khor kun gyi ni nang du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-14: lhan cig skyes dga'i ye shes gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-15: dgang blugs kyis ni mchod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-17: the tshom chen po skyes par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-18: gsang ba yi ni gsang ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-19: rnal 'byor ma rgyud du ma ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-20: mgon pos gang du'ang ma gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-21: de tsam yang ni brdar ma mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40a-22: lhan cig la ni ye shes yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-0: ma gsungs bdag gis @40b thos ma lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-1: de ring de ltar the tshom dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-2: mnga' bdag chen pos gcad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-4: aa la la rab tu ngo mtshar to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-5: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la ci'i phyir ye shes med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-6: dad pa chen po dang brtson 'grus can dang ye shes dang ldan pa yang rmongs par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-7: ye shes med pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ji ltar rnyed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-8: de bzhin du yang 'dir gzhan pa de ma yin pa'i dpe nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-10: du ba las ni mer shes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-11: chu skyar las ni chu yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-12: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-13: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-14: de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rnyed pa'i don gyi phyir skyabs sbyin gyi ngo bo ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-16: tshor bar yongs su shes pas spyod pa'i bdag nyid kyi thabs de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-17: ye shes su bdag gis bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-18: de bzhin du ji ltar mun nag tu rin po che phra mo'i phra mo yod pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-19: rin po che mar me ma yin pas rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de bas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-20: blo gros can gyis rin po che mar me khyer nas tshol bar byed la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:40b-21: gal te de rnyed na de ci mar me las rin po che skye'am; 'on kyang mar me'i thabs kyis mthong ba dang rnyed pa de bzhin du ye shes kyi mar mes lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po mthong zhing rnyed kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-3: de bas na ye shes kyi sgra 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-4: don mi shes pa'i phyir mkhas pas 'dir the tshom mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-5: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-6: mchod pa sna tshogs nges par bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-7: nang gi sbyin sreg ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-8: de nas gtor ma chen po'i las kyi nges par bstan pa'i don bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-9: sems can thams cad bsrung don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-10: 'bad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-11: bha yi yig 'bru bha gar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-12: lim gi yig 'bru lim gar bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-14: sems can thams cad kyi ni tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-16: lha mo de nyid shes bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-17: thams cad sgra ni dga' ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-18: sems can don ni mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-19: tshogs pa de ni dga' bral dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-20: gtor ma de yis bstung ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-21: dur khrod yang ni chu yi dogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-22: ye shes ldan pas sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-23: dur khrod dbugs dbyung gi ni gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-24: gsang ba'i padma'i bya gdong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-26: wa yi yig 'bru lte bar yin; ;sa yi yig 'bru bde ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-27: na yi yig 'bru bcos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-28: dri med ma yi zhu ba'i dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-29: thig le'i ngo bo yi ge bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41a-30: dur khrod dbugs dbyung du ni grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-0: @41b zhal bzang bdag gis bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-1: chu yi ngogs ni rin chen kha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-2: yang na de ni rtog med ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-3: 'byung ba rnams ni bsrung ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-4: de la gtor ma sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-5: 'byung ba khu ba ru ni grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-6: khu ba sems can 'di ru bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-7: sems can snying po ye shes bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-8: bha ga lim ga gnyis las 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-9: de las bsrung ba'i don du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-10: gtor ma kun tu 'bad de sbyin; ;dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-11: 'byung ba bsrung ba'i don du gtor ma chen po nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-13: kye dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-14: 'dir de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-15: zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-16: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-18: rnam pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du legs par zhus shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-21: mchog gi bde ba chen po'i 'od kyi rang gi ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-22: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-23: sdig pa thams cad zad par byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:41b-24: bdud thams cad 'joms par byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-2: ye shes kyi mthar khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-3: lte ba'i padma'i dbus nas bzhengs nas bde ba chen pos rab tu tshim par mdzad ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-6: dri ma me dpa'i sku nam mkha'i ngo bo legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-7: yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das mas gsungs pa khong du chud pas mchog tu dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-8: cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po sprul te rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas nas sngar gyi dri ba de dag zhus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-10: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-11: zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-12: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-14: rnam pa de dag bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-16: dri ba shin tu zab las zab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-17: thams cad mkhyen pas rnyed dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-18: ji ltar de nyid mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-19: nyon cig da yis bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-20: mtshan nyid las skyes de nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-21: de lta mi nan mi mthun no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-22: rang rig pa ni bdag nyid phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-23: de bas brjod par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-24: de nyid gsum bdag de snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42a-25: mtshan mo'i 'du shes rang ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-0: zla ba'i @42b bde mchog snang ba mched //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-1: nyin mo'i 'du shes rang ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-2: phyag rgya chen po snang ba thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-3: mtshams kyi 'du shes rang ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-4: mtha' yi de ni 'od kyi rab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-5: nyin mo mtshan mo sogs dang bral; ;de ni gnas mchog ye shes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-6: blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-7: char yang dang ni thig le'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-8: de nyid gsum bdag brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-9: 'khor lo gsum yod me rlung chu; ;dngos po'i 'du shes rang ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-10: tshul tsam zla ba yi ni bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-11: sa yi 'khor lor bde ni mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-12: de ni rten gyi 'du shes can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-13: lha yi dbang phyug shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-14: phyag rgya chen po 'di ni mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-15: nam mkhar ye shes 'du shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-16: de yi mtha' yi gzhan gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-17: bde chen mchog gi nam mkhar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-18: de ni rnal 'byor ngo bor grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-19: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-20: de ni 'khor lo drug dbus gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-21: rnam shes drug gi rang ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-22: dngos po rten la sogs bye brag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-23: bzhir ni bya bar yod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-24: de nyid gsum bdag bye brag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-25: de ni rnam pa gsum du dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-26: mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams bral phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-27: gcig pu yi ni bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-28: rang bzhin bstan pa gang la lar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-29: mchog gi nam mkha' gang la lar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-30: la lar 'od rab kyi ni gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-31: la lar dga' bar dran pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-32: la lar mchog gi dga' ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:42b-33: la lar dga' bral dga' ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-1: dbye; ;lhan skyes gcig pu rtag tu shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-2: du mar smra bas ci zhig bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-3: 'di kun bdag nyid lhan cig skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-4: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni; ;chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-5: don dam pa yi rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-6: yang dag rtog pa'i gnas med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-7: thabs la sogs pa'i rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-8: bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur; ;bla ma mtho ris thar pa'i bla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-9: bla ma ye shes bla ma bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-10: bla ma ston pa bla ma mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-11: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-12: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-13: mchog gi gnas ni rnyed par 'gyur; ;tshe 'di yis ni phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-14: dngos grub rnyed par the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-15: sa bcu yi ni dbang phyug bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-16: de yi bka' drin gyis ni sla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-17: de bas bla ma las lhag gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-18: ston pa chen po ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-19: gang zhig bla mas bstan bcos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-20: mdzad dam bshad pa gang yin yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-21: de ni bstan bcos de tshad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-22: de ni de nyid 'khrul pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-23: slob dpon gsung dang bdag gis smras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-24: de la bye brag mi dbye 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-26: bla mas mdzad pa'i bstan bcos gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-27: de la sgra dang sgra ngan du; ;lha yi dbang phyug brtag mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-28: snyan ngag zlos gang bstan bcos las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-29: sgra dang sgra ngan brtag bya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43a-30: sngags kyi bstan bcos gtan la phab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-0: ci yi phyir @43b na brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-1: brtag par byed pas gti mug byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-2: rtsa ba'i don ni zad par song //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-3: de phyir sgra dang rtog ge shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-4: de la de nyid bshad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-5: de kun la ni dbang mi bskur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-6: phyi yi don la mos pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-7: thabs dang thabs las byung mtshan nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-8: 'bras bu sbyin pa gang zhig phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-9: de ni thams cad dngos rig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-10: mchog gi don ni ster phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-11: de ltar yang de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-12: zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-13: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' rnyed pa'i don du rnam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-15: rang gi ngo bo ngas smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-16: yang 'dir de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-17: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-19: zla ba'i bde ba mchog ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-20: tshogs kyi rnam par shes pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-22: phyag rgya chen po ni; ;yid kyi rnam par shes pa snang ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-24: rang gi ngo bo'i de'i mtha' la rnam pa mi ba'i rnam par shes pa nam mkha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-28: bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i don yod du chud par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-29: yang na rtsa bzhi'i don du rnam phal sogs par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-30: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-31: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i rang bzhin gyi don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:43b-32: de nas lha mo rab dgyes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-1: bzhin don ni gsal ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-2: dam po ru ni 'khyud byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-4: dur khrod la sogs pa yi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-5: rdo rje rgyal po la ni zhus; ;bsrub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-6: dpal bdag dgyes nas bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-7: dur khrod la sogs pa yi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-8: skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-9: mi bzad 'di ru rnam khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-10: lha mo kha la rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-11: g-yas pa'i sna yi bu ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-12: mi sdug pa ni shin tu tshig //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-13: lce sbyang tshogs ni phyed tshig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-14: sna bug g-yon pa ru ni dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-15: rna ba g-yas pa 'jigs su rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-16: sva sva dang ni tsheg tsheg go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-17: sha za'i kha ni rna ba g-yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-18: dum bu ma go bo la sogs rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-19: lha mo g-yas pa yi ni mig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-20: ha har dgod pa rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-21: rnam pa dang bcas yid dga' ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-23: g-yon pa pho nya nag po me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-24: me lce 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-25: rdo rje'i kha ru 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-26: rus pa dkar po rab khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-27: khu ba gzhan min rus dkar 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-28: nges par lha mo shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-29: de ni shin tu tsha ba skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-30: de tshe 'bar phred khyad par che; ;byang chub sems ni bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-31: mi brtan ma yin pa ru bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-32: de tshe rnam bcas yi dvags kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44a-33: ldan par rab tu grags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-0: gsum dbye bzhir dbye drug @44b dbye 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-1: mchog gi bdud rtsi gang du gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-2: de ni dum mgo la sogs bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-3: gang tshe thim las longs spyod 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-4: de tshe sva sca tshe tsheg go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-6: gang gi tshe ni dbang ma 'grub; ;de phyed tshig ldan dran pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-7: srog gi rlung ni nub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-8: shin tu tshig par brtag pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-9: khu ba nye ba'i shar ma thag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-10: bkram par bdag gis bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-11: lha mo shin tu gsang ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-12: dur khrod brgyad ni rab mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-13: de ni shing brgyad dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-14: nang gi bdag sbyor mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-15: dpal gyi me tog mi rtsi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-16: n'a ga ge sar wa rta dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-17: pa la shing dang shar shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-18: khar ba dang ni sha mi yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-19: yal ga du ma la sogs dang ldan brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-20: 'bras bus dud pa'i gzugs kyis shin tu brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-21: 'dod ma rgyas ma glu stobs ma dang sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-22: mtsho skyes snying po 'dzin ma bya gtong ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-23: mgyogs dang bral ma zhig gnyis kun tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-24: shing mchog chen po rtsa brgyad kyi ni gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-25: yang ni dur khrod chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-26: sbrul pa'i 'khor lo'i chu skyes chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang gsang ba chen po 'dus pa'i gnas dang /
