K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:44b-27: nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i gnas nas rnal 'byor ma re res shing re khyer nas song ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:45a-0: @45a *// ji ltar na sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i chu skyes de kun gyi 'dus pa lags pa bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:45a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:45a-30: glang chen lte ba ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:45b-5: rgyal po'i sras mo dang 'chang tshong ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:45b-15: de kun lha mo rnal 'byor ma; ;shin tu drag la yang dag 'jigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:45b-16: de kun lag na gang zhig shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:45b-17: khyer nas 'od ba khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:45b-32: aa shva dtha dang aa ta bu ta dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:45b-48: rdza ti shing dang gur shing sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:45b-56: ba ni te da ka da dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46a-24: 'dus pa chen po'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs nas dam tshig gi spyod pa chen po byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46a-25: 'dus pa chen po'i gnas brgyad pa brgyad kyi 'dab ma dang ldan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46a-26: 'dab ma re re la rnal 'byor ma de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46a-28: shing ste; de gnyis gcig la gcig mnyam par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46a-29: de ltar shing gi rnam pa nyid kyi rtsal bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46a-31: shing gi sgras rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi khong du chud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46a-32: 'di la rtsa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar srog gi rtsa bar nang dang lhan cig rtsa gsum dang ldan pa'i 'dab ma gsum gyi padma'i g-yas ngos su ping+ga la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46a-34: dbus su bde legs yid 'ong ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46a-38: de dag gi dngos po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-1: rnam par 'byed pa las zhal bzang mo de ru shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-2: shar ba dang nub pa'i dus su rtsa'i 'khor lo'i 'byung ba thams cad 'bad pas btsal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-3: gang gi phyir rtsa'i 'byung ba med par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-4: byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsi bde ba'i ye shes 'di 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-6: 'gro ba'i skye ba shes pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-8: ji ltar phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa rnyed par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-9: de bas na phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa'i don 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bsam gtan la mi g-yeng bas brtson par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-11: bcom ldan rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-12: bsam gtan 'dir ni ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-14: rnal 'byor dbang phyug bsam gtan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-15: nyon cig lha mo ngas rab bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-16: kun rdzob ye shes brten pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-17: gnyis su med pa'i gnas rab rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-18: nyer 'gro bsam gtan mchog gis ni; ;grub pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-19: skyon ni thams cad bral ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-20: yid dang mthun pa'i rang gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-21: lus ni ma bsgrims pa yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-22: spros pa med par stan bder bsdad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-23: lte ba'i dbus na yod pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-24: h'um gi yig 'bru grags chen grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-25: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:46b-26: bskal pa'i me yi 'od dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-2: mkha' 'gro bsregs nas smin mtshams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-3: dbus na grang zhig la 'khor lo yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-4: rang gi ngo bo srog gi rlung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-5: snying gar 'ongs nas de gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-6: rtag tu de ni bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-7: de ni aom yig ngo bor grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-8: sku yi rgyal po rnam par shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-9: srog dang rdub pa 'gog pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-10: srog dang rdub pa'i bza' ba gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-11: srog dang rdub pa gnyis zos nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-12: des ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-13: de nas de la rtags ni kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-15: 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-16: dbyangs kyi bye brag de nas mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-17: kha dog 'gyur dang mchi ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-18: lha mo de las de nyid skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-19: de nas rnal 'byor dbang shes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-20: rnam par shes pa'i yi ge mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-21: nang du lta ba byas pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-22: steng mtshams rtse mo zab pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-23: mchog go nam mkha' bde chen du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-24: yi ge mchog ni shes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-25: tshangs pa'i padmar byon te rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-26: chags pa dang bral gnas su 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-27: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-28: lha mo gnas der shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-30: sa yi dur khrod chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-32: grangs med pa yi rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-33: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thog //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47a-34: nye bar 'gro ba'i bsam gtan las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-0: nges @47b bar 'grub pa'i dbang po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-1: spros med 'od kyi gnas rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-2: dpal ye shes thig le las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-3: dur khrod kyi nges par bstan pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-4: nang gi bsam gtan gyi nye bar 'gro ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-5: bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen po padma'i mchog bskyed cing shin tu dga' bas yang zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-7: dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud 'di'i tshad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-11: mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la bka' stsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-13: gang zhig dri ba mchog byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-14: spyan bzang ma ni khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-15: dpal ldan ye shes thig le yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-16: de yi tshad ni don dam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-17: sus kyang smras par nus ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-18: zhal bzang de ni bden ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-19: 'on kyang cung zad skal ldan mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-20: gsang ba'i ye shes rab mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-21: gang zhig rgyal bas yang mi shes; ;khyod kyi ngor byas bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-22: srog gi dbyug pa'i gang zhig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-23: sor bcu gnyis ni mdud pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-24: 'og gi cha ni bcu gnyis phyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-25: de bzhin sprul pa'i padmar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-27: rtsa ba dang bcas lto nang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-28: rtsa ba rtsa ba'i nang 'ongs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:47b-29: 'dab ma'i ske ru bcar te gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-0: dgug pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor @48a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-1: grags; ;bu ga phra mo nang na ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-2: de ni srog pa rtsa nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-3: khams gsum gyi ni rten yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-4: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-5: rtsa dang 'bras bu rgya yis btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-6: drug phyed rtsa ba dang ldan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-7: rtsa ba'i skud pa byad gzugs gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-8: bcu drug phyed phyed bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-9: rtsa ba'i skud pa gcig pu 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-10: rtsa ba gsum dbye skal ldan mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-11: 'bras bu yang ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-12: rtsa ba'i 'bras bu gnyis kyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-13: bcu gnyis phyed kyi gcig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-14: de ni shin tu phra mo 'jam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-15: rin chen kha nang man chad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-16: de tsam ye shes thig skud yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-17: rnam shes drug po'i rten mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-18: char yang dang ni thig le tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-19: tshul tsam mchog dang gzhan mchog go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-20: shr'i ni gzhan min 'di ru char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-21: thig le rdzny'a zhes su ni dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-22: tshul ni na yi yig 'bru yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-23: te yi yi ge tshul tsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-24: mchog ni la yi yig 'brur bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-25: gzhan mchog ka ru dran pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-26: gug ma'i rnam pa'i kha ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-27: yungs kar che ba'i spom po tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-28: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-29: char yang du grags mchog dbang phyug de yi snying ga'i dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-30: ye shes thig le grub pa bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-31: tshul ni mdud pa'i mgrin par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48a-32: na yi yi ge mtshan zhes mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-0: g-yon glo yi ni 'dab ma'i @48b nang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-1: ti ni thig le'i tshul tsam gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-2: g-yas su la yi yig 'brur grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-3: lha mo mchog ni rtag tu bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-4: steng du gzhan min kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-5: kha yi gnas su rtse mo'i cha; ;de tshad yungs kar rus pa tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-6: ga yi rnam pa'i yi ge mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-7: bde ba chen po'i rang ngor grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-8: rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-9: dpal ldan ye shes thig le 'di; ;mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-10: nam mkhar 'gro ba yi ni phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-11: mkha' 'gro ma ni rtsa kun dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-12: 'jug pa'i gnas su longs spyod yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-13: thim pa'i 'gro ba'i gnas su yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-14: 'byung ba dbang gi gnas su ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-15: rang bzhin de ni mchog gzhan mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-16: g-yon gyi glu ru ai ta'i rtsa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-17: phem ga la ni g-yas su gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-18: rtog med ma ni steng du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-19: phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-20: steng dang 'og gnas yod pa'i rtsa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-21: srid dang mya ngan 'das dag byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-22: g-yon glu ru ni yod pas yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-24: de rnams lte ba'i dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-25: skra rtse bye ba brgya yi cha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-26: de yi tshad ni de bzhin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-27: zhal bzang ye shes thig le 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-28: rnal 'byor ma yi ye shes rang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-29: gsang ba mchog ni bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-30: thos pa yis ni sdig pa zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-31: de nas de la dga' ba skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-32: dran pa yis ni sod nams skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:48b-33: de nas de la mchog dga' skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-2: dga' bral dga' ba rab tu skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-3: reg pa yis ni lhan skyes dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-4: de nas yang dag rab 'od gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-6: gnas la sogs pa'i dag kun no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-8: gnas la grangs ni ji tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-9: mchog gi dbang phyug khyod dbang mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-11: rtag tu sprul pa yi ni skus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-12: sa ni bcu gcig pa ru dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-13: longs spyod rdzogs sku bcu gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-14: chos kyi skus ni bcu gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-15: bde ba chen pos bcu bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-16: gang zhig bco lnga yi ni sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-17: de ni ye shes sa zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-18: bcu drug pa ni brtag pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-19: khyod dang lhan cig zhal bzang mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-20: de kun sa yi dbang phyug bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-21: gnas la sogs pa dga' ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-22: sa yi sgra yis brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-23: sa dang po mos pas spyod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-24: gnyis pa rab tu dga' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-25: gsum pa dri ma med pa; bzhi pa 'od byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-28: bdun pa mngon du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-29: brgyad pa ring du song ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-31: bcu pa legs pa'i blo gros /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-32: de rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-33: chos kyi sprin ni sangs rgyas kyi sa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49a-34: kun tu 'od ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-0: kun tu @49b snang ba mched pa'i 'od ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-1: kun tu snang ba thob pa'i 'od ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-2: yang dag 'od rab chos kyi sku'i sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-3: brjod du med pa tshad med pa ni bde ba chen po'i sa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-4: de kun dga' ba'i bye brag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-5: sar ni kun tu brtags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' mnga' bdag che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-8: sku ni 'di ru ci ru grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-10: sku ni de bzhin gshegs skyabs sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-11: sems ni rdo rje 'dzin par dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-12: phung po lnga las grub pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-13: rigs lnga yi ni bdag nyid mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-14: rigs ni drug pa thugs rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-15: grangs med rigs kyi gtso bo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-16: 'khor lo rin chen de bzhin pad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-17: ral gri rdo rje lnga pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-18: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-19: 'du byed rnam shes de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-20: gzugs ni rnam bar snang mdzad grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-21: gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-22: tshor ba rin chen rgyal po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-23: da rgyal rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-24: 'du shes de ni snang mtha' yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-25: chags pa rdo rjer rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-26: 'du byed don yod grub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-27: phrag dog rdo rje ru ni bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-28: rnam par shes 'dir mi bskyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-29: zhe sdang rdo rje rab tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-30: nam mkha' rdo rje sems dpar grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-31: rnam pa dang bral grub mnga' bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-32: gti mug me long ye shes blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:49b-33: nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid du dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-0: @50a *// so sor rtog pa 'dod chags yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-1: bya ba grub pa phrag dog che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-2: zhe sdang chos dbyings rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-3: bde chen gcig pu las ni 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-4: bye brag lnga ru gyur par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-5: bde ba dkar po bsrubs pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-6: zhal bzang mo ni sra ba gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-7: de ni rnam par snang mdzad cas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-8: gti mug chos kyi mtshan nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-9: bde ba nag po zhu ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-10: de ni mi bskyod pa ru dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-11: bde ba dmar mo'i 'od kyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-12: 'od dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-13: rlung gis khyab phyir bde ba sngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-14: don yod grub pa de rab bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-15: nga rgyal las ni 'dir bde ser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-16: de ni rin chen 'byung ldan yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-17: nam mkha' dang bral grub mgon po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-18: rdor sems rgyal ba kun mnga' bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-19: spyan ring bzang mo de phyir sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-20: lha yi rnam pa rab tu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-21: 'bad pa yis ni de mchod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50a-22: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-6: sha ma 'di yang lha'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-13: 'khar ba las grub pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-16: po ti la sogs pa rnams la phyag mi bya'o; ;gang gi phyir ye shes kyi sku spangs nas phyi'i don gyis ci'i phyir gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-17: phyi yi thams cad skad cig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-18: dga' mo sems kyi rdzu 'phrul yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-19: de ltar sems las gzhan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-20: sems nyid nam mkha' lta bu 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-21: gzugs sogs kha dog gnas pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-22: tha mal pa yi lus su snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-23: rnam par dag pas lha nyid du; ;bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-25: mgon po bla ma ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-26: slob ma yang ni ci 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-27: rgyud kyi rim pa ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-28: re zhig rgyud ni ji ltar gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-29: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-30: dpal ye shes thig le'i tshad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-33: phung po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-34: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-35: bla ma slob ma'i mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:50b-36: bla ma tha mal dngos bral yon tan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-1: min mchog gi dbang gis dbang bskur sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-2: thugs rje dang ldan shin tu rlabs che'i sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-3: de nyid shes pa log pa'i nga rgyal med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-4: bla ma yul gyis ma gos dmu rgod ma yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-5: rgyud lung bstan bcos du ma'i pha rol phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-6: yan lag mtshan mchog kun gyis shin tu brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-7: dkyil 'khor 'bri dang dbang gi rim la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-8: bla ma yid thub srid pa'i 'jigs bral zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-9: mya ngan 'das la 'dod pa'i yid dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-10: dngos po chu zla lta bur nyid kyis mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-11: drug lhag bcu yi stong la gcig tu sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-12: bla mchog nyon mongs med cing skye ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-13: phung po la sogs skye mched khams dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-14: mchog dang dga' bral gnyis ka'i dbus na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-15: de lta'i dpal bla rdo rje rgyal po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-16: slob ma khrims ldan dul zhing dad pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-17: rlabs chen zab mo'i theg pa nyan par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-18: rnam rtog 'dam gyis rtag tu ma gos shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-19: mkhas shing blo rno thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-20: spyan ring bzang mo 'di lta bu dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-21: bla ma dang ni slob ma gnyis rnams gyi; ;mtshan nyid dang ni legs par brtag pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-22: ji lta'i don gyis rab tu gsal ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51a-23: dpal ye shes thig le las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-0: bla ma dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid brtag pa zhes @51b bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-1: de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-2: ji ltar rgyud kyi rim pa bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-3: dpal dang ldan pa'i rigs chen rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-4: 'bum bdun gyi ni mtshan zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-5: de ni gtso bo'i rtsa ba'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-6: sku brgyad bdag nyid rab kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-7: de brtag kye yi rdo rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-8: 'bum lnga yi ni mtshan zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-9: dpal ldan phyag rgya chen thig le //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-10: de yi phyi ma'i rgyud du dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-11: ye shes snying por grags pa'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-12: de yi phyi ma'i phyi ma 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-13: dga' mo ye shes thig le'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-14: bshad pa'i rgyud ni gsang ba che; ;grub pa'i nges bstan thig le ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-15: zhal bzang mo de snying po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-16: de kho na nyid sgrol ma'i mchan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-18: de bdun du ni bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-19: shin tu rmad du byung ba'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-20: lha mo brgyad pa sku dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-21: de phyir smra bar mi btub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-22: de ltar rim pa thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-23: lha mo de nyid shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-24: sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-25: rgyud kun rim shes rim pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-26: rgyud ni rim pas 'di ru grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-27: yang na ye shes 'khor lo rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-28: yang na don ni rgyud yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-29: yang na rim pa gnyis ni rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-30: lha mo gang du skal ldan mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-31: shes rab thabs gnyis phrad pa'i sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-32: de ni rgyud du bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:51b-33: yang na yid shes las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-1: grags; ;na ni de nyid dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-2: ta yi yig 'bru khu ba yab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-3: ra ni yum ste khrag yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-4: de gnyis 'dres pa thig le yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-5: gzhan min rnam par shes ngo bo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-6: de yi thig le aa'i rnam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-7: zla pa'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-8: ta yig dang ni ra yig 'bru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-9: tshul tsam gyis ni gnyis ka ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-10: de ni rab mchog aa yig 'bru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-11: rtsa dang dga' bdag nyid skye med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-12: lha mo 'di ltar rgyud kyi rim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-13: rgyud kyi don yang shin tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-14: dpal ye shes thig le las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-15: rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i rim pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-16: don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-17: bcom ldan ye shes thig le lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-18: nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-19: bdag gi zhu ba gang zhig ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-20: rgyal ba'i mnga' bdag de bdag gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-21: mnga' bdag rang gi ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-22: gang las skyes shing ci las 'ongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-23: de ni mdor bsdus pa yi chig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-24: thub pa chen pos bka' stsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-26: dri ba 'di ni shin tu zab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-27: ye shes kyis rnyed gsang ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-28: lha mo khyod ni 'byung ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-29: skye ba dang ni 'pho med rab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-30: mchog gi rnam rtog rlabs dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-31: rang gi ngo bo ye shes 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52a-32: bdag rang gi ni ye shes sku'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-0: mchog gi dbang phyug ma @52b khyod 'ong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-1: gzhan min bdag dang khyod med na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-3: khyod med na ni khams gsum kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-4: mgo bo chad pa'i mi bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-5: grangs med 'jig rten gyi ni khams; ;khyod ni ye shes 'od byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-6: khyod ni thams cad dngos kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-7: thams cad bdag nyid 'byung ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-8: chos kun yongs su shes nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-9: de ni thams cad mkhyen par grags; ;de yang lha mo khyod kyi drin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-10: brjod par mi nus yang dag don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-11: khyod kyi drin gyis grangs med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnyed 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-13: mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas nas byon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-14: mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas su gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-15: mchog gi nam mkha'i rang ngo khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-16: mchog gi nam mkha'i ngal bsos nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-17: mchog gi nam mkhar rtag tu bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-18: kun rdzob rnam pa'i mchog tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-19: padma'i skud pa ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-20: gsang ba'i sna rtse snying por gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-21: langs nas bde ba'i padmar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-22: thig le khong du chud pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-23: gshegs nas bsten pa thams cad sreg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-24: rgyas pas thig le khyer nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-25: yang ni khyod 'dir byon pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-26: lte ba sprul pa'i padma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-27: lha mo gang tshe khyod kyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-28: de tshe khyod ni shes rab grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-29: legs dgyes rab mchog rmad du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-30: bdag dang lhan cig gnyis med sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:52b-31: legs dgyes dbang mo khyod ni bzhugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-0: @53a *// tshangs pa'i g-yul sa bya ba mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-1: legs dgyes khyod kyi rgya yis btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-2: grangs med pa la rgyas btab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-3: de phyir phyag rgya che khyod grags; ;dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-4: dpal phyag rgya chen po bcom ldan 'das ma'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-5: gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas 'byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-6: rdo rje nyi ma gzhan yang zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-7: re zhig ci'i yang gsang ba gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-8: gnas ni gang na yod pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-10: byang chub sems ni gsang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-11: khu ba'i ngo bo chang dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-12: de yi gnas ni mngal yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-13: phyag rgya dga' ba sbyin pa mo; ;bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-14: byang chub sems ni khu ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-15: de ni ji ltar gsang bar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-16: gsang ba'i gnas ni mngal yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-17: gzhung de bdag la 'thad ma lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-18: de lta na ni gang zag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-19: nges par gsang ba shes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-20: de yang dbang bskur la sogs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-21: su la yang ni mi dgod lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-23: sangs rgyas kun gyi yum khyod de ni bden //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53a-24: gang zhig khyod kyis nges par bzung ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-0: 'on kyang drang ba'i don gyi tshig @53b gis ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-1: rten gyi don phyir yang na nges pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-2: rten med na ni 'bras bu rnyed mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-3: lus kyi dngos med ji ltar 'di ru sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-4: ji ltar don mthun gsang tshig de ni gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-5: drang ba'i don min nges pa'i don yang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-6: dngos med yang min dngos po'i gzugs ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-7: bden rim 'byung ba thim rnams kyi ni gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-8: khu gzugs gang du de ni yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-9: khrag kyang yin par ji ltar yang ni min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-10: mchog dga' dga' bral lhan skyes dga' ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-11: gnas mngal de la nam yang yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-12: rdo rje rtsa ba bde chen la sogs min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-13: drug phyed rtsa dang mtsho skyes snying po min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-14: rig min yang min rig pa nam yang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-15: brjod med nam mkha'i rang gi ngo bo 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-16: 'di lta bu ni don dam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-17: lha mo gsang bar rab tu gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-18: yang ni 'bring gi don gyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-19: bdag gis gsang bshad khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-20: 'bring don de ni don gyi mchog //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-21: mchog gi dga' ba sbyin pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-22: 'bad pas dga' bral srung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-23: dga' bral dga' bas lhan skyes 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-24: nor mdud snying ga yi ni gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-25: byang chub kyi ni sems dang ldan; ;de ni thabs kyi gsang ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-26: shes rab ma yi de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-27: gsang ba shes rab dbang gnyis las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:53b-28: dga' mo gsang ba'i don shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-1: las; gsang ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen pos 'jam pa'i dbyangs la yang zhu ba zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-3: mgon po thams cad gtan phab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-4: rang bzhin ji ltar lags pa gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i tshig gsan pa dang cang mi gsung ba'i dngos pos skad cig tsam bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-6: de nas mi snang ba'i rang gi ngo bor bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen pos bdag rang rten med par mthong nas zhus pas shin tu 'gyod nas cang mi smra bar bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-8: de'i dus su sna tshogs padma la bzhugs pa'i 'khor bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs rnams kyis chos kyi 'byung gnas stong par mthong nas shin tu ya mtshan du gyur pas kun smree zhing brgyal par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-9: kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-10: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gang na bzhugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54a-12: kun tu stong par bdag cag gis mthong lags so; ;lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-0: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag rgya chen pos @54b 'di ltar zhus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-1: mgon po thams cad gtan la phab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-2: rang bzhin ji ltar lags pa gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-3: de lta bu'i tshig gsan pa dang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-12: rigs pa med pa la dris pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-13: de nyid smrar mi btub pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das snang ba med par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-14: yang 'khor thams cad kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-16: blo gros chen po chos kyi mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-17: snang ba med cing dngos po med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-19: de'i don la shin tu 'jigs shing yang dag par yid zhum par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-20: lha'i dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-21: snang ba med par 'du shes gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-22: de ni dngos med shes mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-23: nang gi rang ngor 'gro ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-24: snang ba med par 'di ru brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-26: yid skyo ba ni yongs su spongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-27: de la thabs ni gcig yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-28: gang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:54b-29: sngar ni khyod kyis mthong ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-0: de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te @55a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-1: bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bya ba'i phyir thabs zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-2: kye blo gros chen po dpa' bo chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-3: thabs ci yod pa bdag cag la bstan du gsol; dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-4: dus gcig tu mgrin gcig gis snyan pa'i glus mchod pa gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-5: de lta bu'i thabs kyi tshig thos nas thams cad dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs pas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-6: de nas drug ldan la sogs pa'i glu thams cad len no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-7: kye; sku rab mchog gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-8: gang na bzhugs pa mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-9: de nyid dang bral chad pa'i stong de ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-10: gnyis med bde bas mkhyen par mi 'gyur ram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-11: rdo rje mtsho skyes mchog sbyor yongs su gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-12: gang zhig dngos med dngos de spyad par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-13: de nang rang bzhin las bcom ldan; ;chu las nya ni bzhin du bzhengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-14: mchog gi dga' ba'i gzugs bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-15: mchog gi dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-16: dngos dang dngos min gnyis kyi steng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-17: gyen bltas padma'i lte bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-18: zhal bzhi dang ni phyag bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-19: shin tu ngo mtshar sku dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55a-20: rgyal po yi ni bzhugs thabs bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-0: brgyad gnyis blo ldan byad gzugs @55b can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-1: spyan gsum mchog gi rnam pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-2: zla ba nyi ma zhabs kyis mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-3: rnga'u chung thod pa kha tv'am ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-4: rdo rje 'bar ba phyag na bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-5: de lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i gzugs mthong nas 'khor thams cad lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen mo langs nas lan gsum du bskor ba byas te dam por 'khyud nas bstod pas bstod ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-6: mchog tu rmad byung chen po'i sku ni rgyal gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-7: ye shes zab mo rgya mtsho'i snying po rgyal gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-8: brjod bral bltar med dngos med sku mi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-9: gti mug chen po 'joms de rgyal gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-10: mchog dang gzhan mchog de ni mchog gzhan mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-11: mkha' mchog 'od mchog mchog gi ye shes snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-12: mchog gi bdud rtsi'i snying po gang ba'i rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-13: mi 'chad rgyun 'bab byed pa rgyal gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-14: shin tu lkog gyur dbang pos bltar med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-15: skye 'gag 'du byed mtshan med rgyal gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-16: de lta bu'i bstod pa'i rgyal po byas nas yang phyag rgya chen mo lha mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das la dad pas zhu bzhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ci'i phyir ma gsungs lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-20: bsrub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-22: dang po rtsom pa shin tu 'dar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:55b-23: rnam par shes pas lha mo skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-2: 'dod pa'i gti mug rnam par thos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-3: grong khyer las ni longs spyod yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-4: spyod lam lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-5: bskum pa las ni snang ba mched //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-6: snang ba ma [?] las ye shes 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-7: bgrad pa las ni skye ba sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-8: sbyor las dga' ba'i skye ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-9: mnyam sbyor las ni ye shes skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-10: ye shes las ni dngos zad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-11: khyod las 'di ru dngos po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-12: dngos po longs spyod zla ba ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-13: dkar po las ni rten shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-14: rten las padma'i lte ba ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-15: brang brdabs las ni rnam par 'byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-16: rnam par 'byed las pad mig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-17: nag dang ljang dang gur gum mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-18: dmar dang sngon po yi ni gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-19: zla ba dkar dang dmar gyi sngon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-20: sgo la sogs dang mtshams na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-21: zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-22: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-23: snod dang gri gug gis phyag brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-24: na bza' grol ba phyag gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-25: de ni nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-26: rus pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-27: khyod kyi bzhugs thabs ji lta bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-28: lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-29: de rnams thabs ni bzhi gnyis kyi ni grangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-30: mnyam ba'i bzhugs thabs phyag dang zhabs la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56a-31: rab tu dga' ba'i yid ldan zhi ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-0: rtag tu sems can don @56b byed kho na brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-2: dpa' bo rnams kyi ming gi brda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-3: de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rjes gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-5: khyod kyis nga la gang zhus ba; ;skal ldan lha mo de ni nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-6: 'di yi rgyud la bdag la gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-7: mtshan ni yod pa gang la lar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-8: na ni lte ba gsang ba'i pad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-9: dga' bral dga' ba sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-10: ma zhes nor bu srub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-11: mchog gi dga' ba sbyin pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-12: gang zhig de yi dbus nas langs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-13: de ni bdag gi rang bzhin mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-14: dpa' bo rnams ni bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-15: shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-16: lha chen po dang khyab 'jug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-17: padma'i lte ba shin tu blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-18: lha yi dbang dang 'dod pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-19: padma'i mig dang gzhon nu ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-20: re zhig de ni dkyil 'khor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-21: rang gi phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-22: dpal ye shes thig le las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-23: bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-26: dbang bskur ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor rnams ji lta bu lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-27: cho ga gang gis dbang bskur ba sbyin zhing blang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-29: chu la sogs pa'i dbang dus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-30: rdul tshon la sogs dkyil 'khor mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:56b-31: gsang ba'i dbang bskur dus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-2: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-3: sna tshogs dri zhim po yis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-4: las dang po yi dang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-5: nges pa'i don gyi chu la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-6: dbang bskur shes pas sbyin bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-7: de ltar min na skyon du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-8: shes rab can gyis drang don der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-9: sbyin no de nas dam chig sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-10: nor bu mgrin par byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-11: bla ma nyid kyis rang rig byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-12: shes rab lhan cig gnas las langs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-13: slob ma'i kha yi padma ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-14: nyid kyi rdo rje rab tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-15: de nas bde ba'i bdud rtsis dkrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-16: mgrin pa'i dbus su rtsa gnyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-17: g-yas dang g-yon na yod pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-18: sbom ma yangs mar 'di ru grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-19: srog dang nye ba'i rang ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-20: g-yon ni srog tu shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-21: nye ba'i srog ni g-yas na 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-22: de ru bde bar 'jug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-23: mthe bong srin lag gnyis kyis mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-25: bu mos rnyed pa'i bde ji bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-26: reg bya chen pos dga' ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-27: dga' ba chen pos bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-28: bde ba chen pos byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-29: shes par bya gdong ma yi khar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-30: nor bu'i kha las thigs pa gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-31: shes rab ye shes zhal bzang mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-32: shes rab bya gdong las bde ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57a-33: rdo rje rin chen kha ru 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-0: de ni dbang @57b gi mchog rang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-1: sangs rgyas grub pa'i 'bras sbyin bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-2: shes rab gzugs bzang bha ga rab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-3: shin tu lang tsho dbang bskur ldan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-5: sems dpa' chen po shes rab 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-6: yang dag ye shes rab tu ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-7: gang zhig bka' lung skyabs sbyin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-8: de ni bu khyod dad par bya; ;de yi mngal gyi g-yon logs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-9: ai ta bya gdong ma ni bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-10: de rnyed tsam gyis rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-11: shes rab bsnyen pas rnyed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-12: de ni gzhan min yongs su shes; ;bzhi ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-13: rang rig pa dang mchog ye shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-14: ngag gi lam gyis rnyed dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-15: des na lha mo skal ldan mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-16: gsang ba las ni shin tu gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-17: rgyud kun du ni bdag gis sbas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-18: mtha' yi mtha' ru rab tu gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-20: mtha' dang mtha' yi don ni ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-21: mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-23: mtha' ni rnam par 'byed par shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-24: rnam par 'byed pa bcom pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-25: rnam par 'byed pa bcom pa'i mtha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-27: rnam par 'byed mthar ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:57b-28: de rang ngo bo'i rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-2: mnga' bdag ji lta'i rnam pas bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-4: gang zhig khyod kyis yongs su zhus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-5: nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-7: las la mkhas pas bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-9: padma'i nang du char yang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-10: char yang dang ldan sna tshogs 'dab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-11: char yang gi nang thig le ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-12: de yi steng du rdo rje bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-14: rdo rje gri gug gis ni bskor //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-17: sna tshogs bum pa dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-18: dkyil 'khor rab kyi mchog ni bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-20: byang du de bzhin padmo 'o; ;nub kyi 'dab mar rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-21: lho ru ral gri bsgreng ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-22: padma gzhan rnams thod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-23: bdud rtsi lnga yis rab tu gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-24: dung gzhu de bzhin ri rab dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-25: rab tu 'bar ba yi ni me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-26: me mtshams la sogs rim bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-27: 'bad pa yis ni yongs su bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-28: shar gyi sgor ni dpag bsam shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-29: byang du 'bras bu sa bon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-30: nub tu rin chen sdong bu dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58a-34: lha mo chen mo de lta bu'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-2: rab tu 'bad pa yis ni bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-14: dga' bral las ni lhan cig skyes //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-19: mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-21: go tra ba las s'a lu ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-24: bde min dga' bral sdug bsngal des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-25: dga' ba kun ni 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-26: mchog gi dbang phyug dga' bral 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-27: dga' ba kun dang mi mthun no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-28: dga' ba las ni mchog dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-29: mchog dga' ba las shin tu dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-30: bcom ldan mkha' 'gro de rigs lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:58b-31: yang na mchog las lhan skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-2: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma de bden //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-3: dga' bral las ni lhan skyes min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-4: 'od kyang de bsrubs pa las yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-5: de min lhan skyes gang du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-6: dga' ba kun dang mi mnyam ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-7: dga' ba kun ni 'joms byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-8: 'di skad smra ba shin tu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-9: don dam pa yi tshig yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-10: dga' kun 'gro ba yang gcig pu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-12: sprin med snying ga'i nam mkha' ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-13: ye shes nyi ma rab mdzes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-14: dpal ldan ye shes thig le rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-15: nam yang de ni thos ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas ni mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-17: lha mo de ni gang las rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-18: rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-19: du ma'i rgyud du bshad na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-20: de lta mod kyi rgyud 'di yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-21: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-22: de skad smra ba'i rgyud gzhan kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-23: dge ba'i yid dang ldan yang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-24: 'di ru dang ba med gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-26: mdo sde la sogs gsung rab kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-27: dad cing gus pa kho na yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-28: gang phyir rgyud kun gyi snying po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-29: de phyir rgyud 'di rab kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-31: sbas pa'i yi ge drang ba gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-32: snying po ye shes 'bras bu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59a-33: nye ba'i snying po de ni mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-0: de ni de ring gsal @59b bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-2: sngags ni shin tu gsal ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-3: de lta na yang gsal bar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-5: grub pa rnyed pas sangs rgyas sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-6: h'a sv'a ta pha h'um h'um ka la ti na dzny'a dzrab h'am shr'i aom//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-7: h'a sv'a ta phat pha ham ham h'um h'um hrim hrim aom/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-8: h'a sv'a ta pha h'um h'um ye m'a ksha la ba ma h'a ma ye da ma dzre ba aom//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-9: h'a sv'a ta pha h'um h'um ra sa wi ra sa aom//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa rnams kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa mand'a ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-13: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-14: sngon med ba'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyi chun po 'phyang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-19: rig pa 'dzin pas byas pa rmad du byung ba'i chos gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-20: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-22: nam mkha' las nor bu'i char bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi rtsar babs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-23: de nas nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-24: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstod pas bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-25: sangs rgyas kun gyis ku gcig pu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-26: legs so legs so bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:59b-27: shin tu rmad byung ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-3: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-4: yang dag mchog gi gsang ba 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-5: rnyed par dka' ba don dam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-6: dpal ldan ye shes thig le'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-7: ye shes rgya mtsho gtan la phab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-8: de lta bu'i tshogs kyi mchod pa byas nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams de kho na nyid kyi bsam gtan la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-11: bde ba chen po gcig pu'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-12: tshig rgyas pa yi snying po'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-13: mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-14: mchog gi dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-15: nyon cig lha mo gsang ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-16: rgyud kun du ni rnyed dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-17: gsang sna padma'i snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-18: tshogs kyi gnas su 'di ru brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-19: rdo rje'i rtse mo kha phye'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-20: de ni rgyas par brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-21: yang na thams cad kyi ni tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-22: snying po bya yi gdong mar dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-23: de la rdo rje rtse mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-24: phye ba de ni rgyas par brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-25: ai da ping+gal gnyis kyi dbus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-26: rtog med ye shes ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-27: bsrub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-28: rdo rje'i mthe chung rtse mo las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-29: reg byas gang gis bde bar 'dzag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60a-30: zhal bzang de ni tshig rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-0: lte @60b pa'i gnas nas smin 'khor lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-1: de nas gnas pa'i rna ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-2: spyi rtse tshangs pa'i bu ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-3: tshig rgyas pa ni gsum du dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-4: ma ni srub dang srub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-5: ra ni dga' ba yin par brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-6: mu ni lha mo sgrol ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-7: da yi yig 'bru zhu ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-8: gha yi yig 'bru sgra ru grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-9: ta yi yig 'bru gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-10: na ni lte ba'i gsang ba'i mthar; ;de yi dbus su rtag tu shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-11: zla ba'i sku dang 'dra ba gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-12: nyi ma bye ba'i mnyam pa'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-14: byang chub kyi ni lam rab ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-15: de ni gsang ba ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-16: rang bzhin tshig gis rab gsal byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-17: 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-18: su la'ang sbyin par mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-19: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-20: tshig rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-21: de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-22: ye shes rab mchog gang gis smras; ;de kho na nyid bdag don zab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-23: des bstan la sogs bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-24: srog gi dbyug pa bzhugs thabs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-25: rtsa dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-26: thig le shar ba nub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-27: 'pho ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-29: dbang gi rim pa de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-30: srung ba'i 'khor lo lha mo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:60b-31: snying po sngags kyi rgyal po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-2: thim dang longs spyod dang ni dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-3: rdo rje lha mo ye shes sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-4: gsang ba'i sgra yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-5: srung ba'i dam tshig la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-6: dpal ldan sbyin sreg don dam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-7: bsrub dang srub pa'i dgyes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-8: sngags kyi bzlas pa mchod sbyin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-9: gnas brgyad sku yi ngo bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-10: dga' ba la sogs pa yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-11: dur khrod rnam rtog med par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-12: chu ngogs rtog pa med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-13: snang ba la sogs mchog ye shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-14: dngos po la sogs bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-15: thog ma tha ma dur khrod brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-16: zhing la sogs pa bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-17: rlung gi de nyid snying po'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-19: nyer 'gro sbyor ba rab mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-20: nyid ni ye shes thig le dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-21: rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-22: sa la sogs pa'i bdag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyabs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-24: rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-25: phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-26: gsang ba yi ni don dam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-27: de nyid mchod pas bskul ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-28: shes rab ye shes ji bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-30: zhal bzang tshig rgyas bstan pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-31: gtor ma 'byung la phan don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-32: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61a-33: de ni bde ba chen po'i mtha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-0: @61b de nyid bsdus pa'i snying po'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-1: bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-2: gsang chen bdag gis rab tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-3: de nyid sum cu drug bdag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-4: char yang ye shes tshor byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-5: thig le ye shes bdag nyid tshor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-6: de ni sum cu bdun dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-7: tshul gyis ye shes bdag nyid tshor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-8: de ni sum cu brgyad dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-9: tshul tsa ma ye shes tshor byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-10: dgu lhag sum cu de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-11: mchog shes pa yi rnal 'byor gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-12: bzhi bcu'i mnga' bdag chen po 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-13: gzhan mchog gsung lam brjod du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-14: rnam par dag pa de nyid mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-15: thams cad de kho'i bdag nyid phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-16: de bas bye brag mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-17: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-18: de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-20: bcom ldan 'das ni mchog dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-21: kun dga' ba yi rnam pa sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-22: de kho na nyid zhal brgyad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-23: rnam par dag pa ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-25: de nyid sgom pa rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-26: skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-27: zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-28: nang gi stong pa de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-29: spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-30: sa dang stobs dang ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-31: phyag rnams stong nyid rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:61b-32: brgyad gnyis phyag ni stong pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-1: pa'i yon tan sde dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-2: thod pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-3: sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-4: 'jigs byed ma ni brgyad gnyis dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-5: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-6: zhabs bzhi ru ni dran pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-7: chags sdang de bzhin gti mug ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-8: legs dgyes zla nyi 'jigs byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-9: gang zhig srid pa'i gnas su bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-10: zhal bzang de phyir g-yas brkyang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-11: lha mo g-yon bskum mya ngan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-12: ye shes sku nyid bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-13: srid dang mya ngan 'das min phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-14: lha mo de phyir bzhengs pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-15: gzugs brgyad rnam par dag pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-17: gzugs med gnyis kyi 'du shes phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-18: shes rab thabs gnyis bdag nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-19: gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-20: zhal bzang mo ni sna tshogs gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-22: thams cad mkhyen pa mchog dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-23: bcom ldan bdag gis rnam dag shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-24: gsang ba'i don gyis 'di ltar mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-27: gsang ba'i sgom pa rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-28: lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-29: zhal dang lhan cig pa yi spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-30: zhal bzang gnas la sogs pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62a-31: longs spyod rdzogs par yod pa'i rtsa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-0: bcu drug phyag ni @62b bcu drug pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-1: a'a li thig le rnam dag pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-2: thod pa yin par 'di ru bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-4: legs dgyes dga' ba bcu drug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-5: skad cig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-6: zhabs ni bzhi ru dran pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-7: g-yas brkyang ba ni mchog gi dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-8: g-yon brkyang dga' ba dga' ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-9: bzhengs pa lhan skyes dga' ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-10: phyag rgya pha rol phyin par dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-11: dbang gi rang gi ngo bo 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-12: thim pa smad kyi tshangs pa'i ras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-13: longs spyod zhi ba'i pags pa'i gos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-14: legs dgyes dbang phyug yang na gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-15: bskyed pa tshangs pa'i pags par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-16: bong bu'i zhal ni 'jigs pa'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-17: phyag rgya shes rab thabs ni che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-18: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-19: byang chub sems kyi rnam dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-20: rus pa sna tshogs rgyan la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-21: nam mkha' ru ni 'gro pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-22: gyen du 'bar ba'i dbu skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-23: rang gi ngo bo bde chen phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-24: sku mdog nag po mkha' dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-25: dga' bral gyi ni bdud chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-27: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:62b-28: rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das mas ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i ro phul te nyi ma dang zla ba'i me tog gis mchod nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu @63a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-1: tshim par mdzad nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang dag par gsang pa'i rgyud 'di skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sus 'chad par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-5: dpal phyag na rdo rje mgon pos bshad par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-7: ye shes bdud rtsi'i char pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-8: mgon po khyod kyis rmad byung sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-9: phyag na rdo rje mgon po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-10: de yi bskyed pa ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-11: rgyal ba'i mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-12: de ni tshig gcig bka' stsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-14: gang zhig khyod kyis yongs zhus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-15: bcom ldan ma de yang dag nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-16: phyag na rdo rje mgon chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-17: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-18: mtha' yas pa yi 'jig rten khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-19: skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-20: de las skye pa gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-21: rang byung mchog gi dbang phyug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-22: de yi phyag gi rdo rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-23: ye shes bcu gnyis skye ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-24: thog ma yis ni rva lnga las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-26: mtha' nas 'byung ba chen po lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-28: lta ba kun ni bsrung don phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63a-29: sna tshogs pa yi gzugs su spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-0: la lar @63b rdo rje 'dzin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-1: la lar sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-2: la lar he ru ka yi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-3: la lar de bzhin gshegs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-4: la lar byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-5: la lar nyan pa lta bur bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-7: la lar klog pa'i tshul du bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-8: la lar rgyud dang bstan bcos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-9: mdzad pa dang ni la lar 'dzin; ;mang du brjod lta ci zhig dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-10: de ston phyag na rdo rje rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-13: de la mdor bsdus ji ltar lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-16: mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma dgyes mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-17: gru bzhi la sogs dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-18: dur khrod kyi ni rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-19: shing brgyad kyis ni chal par bkram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-20: rdzing brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-21: de dbus sna tshogs chu skyes ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-22: 'dab ma dang ni ge sar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-23: de yi dbus su lha thod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-24: dum bu gsum pa kun dang bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-25: rang gi ngo bo chos kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-26: bdud rtsi lngas ni shin tu gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-27: h'um gi yig 'bru de dbus gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-28: ye shes ma yi 'od dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-29: zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-30: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-31: h'um la sogs pa yongs gyur las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:63b-32: skad cig gcig gis rmad du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-0: lha mo bcu gnyis dang ldan @64a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-1: pa; ;phyag na rdo rje rgyal po bzhengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-2: zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-3: char sprin gyi ni mdog dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-4: phyag bzhi pa ni rta la bcibs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-6: bskal pa chen po'i me dang 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-7: nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-8: gdul dka' chen po 'dul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-9: snying rje'i rlan gyis brlan par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-10: phyag rgya lnga 'dzin dpa' bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-11: ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis ni brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-12: ra la pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-13: sna tshogs rdo rje zla cod pan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-14: phyag g-yas pa ni rdo rje 'dzin; ;sna tshogs kyi ni 'od zer 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-15: g-yon ni thod pa kha tv'am ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-16: gzhan pas rdo rje'i mda' dang gzhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-17: rta ni 'di ru sngon po'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-18: spyan gsum pa la drag po'i 'od; ;zhi ba'i pags pas sga cha byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-19: dgod pa'i nga ro gshog pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-24: byang du rdo rje 'jigs byed ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-31: dkar po ste ngang pa la bcibs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-32: phyag dang mtshon cha la sogs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-34: mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhir bdud rtsi sna tshogs pas gang ba'i bum pa'i steng na thod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64a-35: mtshams su rdo rje 'dod ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-0: rdo @64b rje gtsag bu ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-1: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-2: rdo rje brtson ma rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-4: nam mkha' lding la bcibs pa gtso bo lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-5: shar sgo la sogs par rdo rje sha wa ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-6: rdo rje ro langs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-7: rdo rje rab tu gtum ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-8: rdo rje do mbhi ni ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-12: du ba'i mdog bya rgod la bcibs pa mtshams kyi bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i snam bu la tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-16: mi mchog la sogs pa 'dre'i rgyal po rang rang gi mtshon cha phyag na bsnams pa du ma bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-18: phyag na rdo rje gtso bo'i gsang sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-20: sems can rnams kyis ji ltar bsgom par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-22: lha mo sngags ni yi ge drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-23: thams cad 'dod pa'i don grub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-24: gdug pa thams cad 'jigs byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-25: nad rnams kun ni zad par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-26: dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-27: thams cad mkhyen pas mi thub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-29: rnal 'byor khro po'i lta bas bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-32: yang na zhi ba'i lta bas bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-33: mtha' yas pa yi nad zhi byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-34: mchod sbyin yang dag cher byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:64b-35: sngon du bsnyen pa bye ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-2: ji ltar sngar ni bdag gis smras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-3: dur khrod yang na chu ngogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-4: phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-5: dung chen gyi ni phreng ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-6: 'grub pa'i don phyir bye ba bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-7: zhi ba zhi ba'i sems kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-8: drag po drag po sgrub par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-9: dbang bskur med pa'i sems can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-10: sngags 'di sbyin par mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-11: mkhas pas bris sku glegs bam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-12: nam yang de la bstan mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-14: kun nas kun tu rab tu blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-16: kun nas kun tu zhal bzang mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-18: 'dab ma sna tshogs pa yis mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-19: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-20: mnga' bdag phyag na rdo rje rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-21: rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis ni bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-22: nam mkha'i mdog ltar sngo ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-23: phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-24: spyan gsum pa la zhi ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-25: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-26: rdo rje thod pa kha tv'am ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-27: chos kyi don ni 'chad pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-28: phyag gnyis chos kyi phyag rgya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-29: 'dab ma bdun la sangs rgyas bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-30: brgyad pa la ne byams pa 'o; ;pa ti la sogs shing la brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-31: thams cad zla ba'i gdan du dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-32: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65a-33: gzhan min sgo la sogs par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-0: rdo rje lcags kyu la @65b sogs bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-1: sgo yi mtshams su gnas pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-2: sgo yi phyi rol snam bu'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-3: yang dag lha chen la sogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-4: rdo rje phreng bas kun tu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-5: mkhas pas yongs su bskor bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-6: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-7: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i sgom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-8: de nas de'i dus su 'khor thams cad stan las langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-9: mgon khyod bka' drin gyis ni bdag cag dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-10: gzhan dang mi mnyam rgyal bas rnyed dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-11: blta bar dka' ba shes dka' gzung bar dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-12: gsang ba'i gsang ba mchog gi mchog rab nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-13: dpa' bo dbang phyug chos dbyings phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-14: log shes mun nag 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-15: dang po'i sangs rgyas mchog chas [?] sa la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-16: yig bral thig le skye med la phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-17: nam mkha'i rang bzhin tshul grags la phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-18: gnyis su med pa'i tshul tsam la phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-20: gzhan min gzhan mchog rang bzhin phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:65b-21: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:66a-1: pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:66a-2: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma la bos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:66a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sbyor drug gi grags pa bcu dang bral ba bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:66a-5: dpal mchog gi bla ma'i zhal snga nas padma btsal te bsam gtan la sogs pas yang dag par mthong ba zhes gtan la phab pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:66a-6: dpal ye shes thig le las; mchog tu gsang zhing shin tu gsang ba thams cad mkhyen ba rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:66a-7: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rmad du byung ba mchog chen po nang gi rnam par shes pa drug gi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:66a-8: dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:66a-9: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shr'i pra dzny'a guptas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-001:66a-10: slad kyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su zhu gtugs g-yar khral bgyis so /
